ILRTMI01 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'ILRTMI01  76.105'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00010000
*                                                                  0068 00011000
         USING  ILRTMI01,REG15                                          00012000
         C     REG0,TWELVE         SDWA PASSED                          00013000
         BNE   YESSDWA             YES                                  00014000
         LR    BASEREG,REG15       NO, LOAD BASE VALUE                  00015000
         B     NOSDWA              CODE IS AT END OF MODULE             00016000
TWELVE   DC    F'12'               VALUE FOR NO SDWA PASSED             00017000
YESSDWA  STM   REG14,REG12,12(REG13) SAVE REGISTERS                     00018000
         DROP  REG15                                                    00019000
         LR    BASEREG,REG15      LOAD BASE VALUE                       00020000
         USING ILRTMI01,BASEREG                                         00021000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00022000
*   /*                                                               */ 00023000
*   /* RTM PASSED A SDWA (ADDR IN REG 1) AND THE EPATH ADDR IS       */ 00024000
*   /* POINTED TO BY SDWAPARM. REG 13 POINTS TO A 72 BYTE REG SAVE   */ 00025000
*   /* AREA.                                                         */ 00026000

*   ASMVTPTR=CVTASMVT;              /* GET THE PTR TO THE ASMVT      */ 00030000

GMA00122 ST    R14,GMANEXT(,R1)                                    0189 00438000
*                 CS(R14,R1,ASMCPAVL);/* ADD INPUT CELL TO POOL      */ 00439000
         CS    R14,@01,ASMCPAVL(REG11)                             0190 00440000
*                 BC(7,GMA00122);                                  0191 00441000
         BC    7,GMA00122                                          0191 00442000
*               END;                /* ACE RETURNED TO NORMAL Q      */ 00443000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0193 00444000
*              (R0,                                                0193 00445000
*               R1,                                                0193 00446000
*               REG11,                                             0193 00447000
*               REG12,                                             0193 00448000
*               R14,                                               0193 00449000
*               R15) UNRESTRICTED;                                 0193 00450000
@RC00180 DS    0H                                                  0194 00451000
*           END;                    /* ILRGMA FREE                 0194 00452000
*                                      CELL(ACE)WORKREGS(REG11,REG12)*/ 00453000
*                                                                  0194 00454000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00455000
*           /*                                                       */ 00456000
*           /* END ILRGMA MACRO EXPANSION                            */ 00457000
*           /*                                                       */ 00458000
*           /*********************************************************/ 00459000
*                                                                  0195 00460000
*         END;                      /* FOR ACE IS VALID              */ 00461000
*       IF EPARASPÂ¬=0 THEN                                         0196 00462000
@RF00170 SLR   @15,@15                                             0196 00463000

         CR    @12,@15                                             0196 00465000

*         DO;                       /* THERE IS A CHAIN OF BUFFERS 0197 00467000
*                                      FOR RETRIEVED ASPCT S         */ 00468000

*                                      BUFFER IN REG 1               */ 00470000

*           CALL ILRAFS00;          /* GO FREE THE CHAIN OF BUFFERS  */ 00477000

*                                                                  0204 00482000

*       /*                                                           */ 00484000

*       RFY                                                        0210 00507000

*         REG6,                                                    0211 00511000
*         REG7,                                                    0211 00512000
*         REG8) UNRSTD;                                            0211 00513000
*       EPAVSAMI=BITOFF;            /* RESET IF ON                   */ 00514000
*       EPARPLB=BITOFF;             /* RESET IF ON                   */ 00515000
         NI    EPAVSAMI(EPAPTR),B'01111110'                        0213 00516000
*       EPARECUR=BITON;             /* TURN ON TMRLG RECURSION     0214 00517000

*                                                                  0217 00524000

*   /*                                                               */ 00526000
*   /* AT THIS POINT M.S.I. IS NOT POSTED. DETERMINE IF TMI WAS IN   */ 00527000
*   /* CONTROL                                                       */ 00528000
*   /*                                                               */ 00529000

*                                                                  0217 00531000
*   IF EPATMI=BITOFF THEN                                          0217 00532000

*     DO;                           /* TMI WAS NOT IN CONTROL        */ 00535000

*   /*                                                               */ 00586000

*                                                                  0237 00590000

*       EPABUILD=BITOFF;            /* RESET TRACKING FLAG           */ 00725000

*TMIRETRY:                                                         0281 00727000
*       ;                                                          0281 00728000
*                                                                  0281 00729000
TMIRETRY DS    0H                                                  0282 00730000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00731000
*       /*                                                           */ 00732000
*       /* THIS ROUTINE IS ENTERED FOR ALL RETRIES(EXCEPT RECORD     */ 00733000
*       /* ONLY) INTO TMI. VALUES FOR REGS 3,4,5,11,12, AND 13 ARE   */ 00734000
*       /* SET UP, ANY OTHER REGS REQUIRED FOR A RETRY POINT MUST BE */ 00735000
*       /* SET UP BEFORE ENTERING HERE                               */ 00736000
*       /*                                                           */ 00737000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00738000
*                                                                  0282 00739000
*       REG1=SDWAPTR;               /* MAKE SURE REG1 POINTS TO THE     00740000
*                                      SDWA FOR BASE                 */ 00741000
         L     REG1,SDWAPTR                                        0282 00742000
*       SDWASR03=ASMVTPTR;          /* ADDR OF ASMVT                 */ 00743000
         ST    ASMVTPTR,SDWASR03(,REG1)                            0283 00744000
*       SDWASR04=EPAPTR;            /* ADDR OF THE EPATH             */ 00745000
         ST    EPAPTR,SDWASR04(,REG1)                              0284 00746000
*       SDWASR05=EPATMACB;          /* ADDR OF ACB                   */ 00747000
         MVC   SDWASR05(4,REG1),EPATMACB(EPAPTR)                   0285 00748000
*       SDWASR11=EPATMIBA;          /* BASE REGS ARE REG11           */ 00749000
         L     @15,EPATMIBA(,EPAPTR)                               0286 00750000

*       SDWASR12=EPATMIBA+4095;     /* AND REG12                     */ 00752000
         AH    @15,@CH02258                                        0287 00753000
         ST    @15,SDWASR12(,REG1)                                 0287 00754000
*       SDWASR13=EPATMISV;          /* REG SAVE AREA ADDR            */ 00755000
         MVC   SDWASR13(4,REG1),EPATMISV(EPAPTR)                   0288 00756000
*       RFY                                                        0289 00757000
*         RTYAREG RSTD;                                            0289 00758000
*       RTYAREG=EPATMIRT;           /* PUT RETRY ADDR IN REG FOR   0290 00759000
*                                      SETRP                         */ 00760000
         L     RTYAREG,EPATMIRT(,EPAPTR)                           0290 00761000
*       GOTO TMSETRP;               /* GO REQUEST RETRY              */ 00762000
         B     TMSETRP                                             0291 00763000
*       RFY                                                        0292 00764000
*         RTYAREG UNRSTD;                                          0292 00765000
*     END;                          /* FOR BUILDSNL WAS IN CONTROL   */ 00766000
*                                                                  0294 00767000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00768000
*   /*                                                               */ 00769000
*   /* AT THIS POINT THE PLACE OF ERROR IN TMI IS UNKNOWN OR WARMERR */ 00770000
*   /* HAD AN ERROR                                                  */ 00771000
*   /*                                                               */ 00772000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00773000
*                                                                  0294 00774000
*CKOPER:                                                           0294 00775000
*   ;                               /* SEE IF THE OPERATOR DESIRES TO   00776000

*                                      JOURNALING (NO ACTIVE TMRLG 0294 00778000
*                                      TASK)                         */ 00779000

*   MSGREQ=MSGREQ21;                /* REQUEST MSG 21I               */ 00782000

*   CALL MSGPROC;                   /* ISSUE MSGS ILR021I AND ILR022A*/ 00784000
*                                                                  0296 00785000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00787000
*   /*                                                               */ 00788000
*   /* MSGPROC ONLY RETURNS IF THE OPERATOR WANTS TO CONTINUE. CLEAN */ 00789000
*   /* UP RESOURCES OBTAINED BY TMI THEN RETRY IN TMRLG AFTER THE    */ 00790000
*   /* CALL TO TMI. THIS WILL CAUSE TMRLG TO PERMANENTLY WAIT        */ 00791000
*   /*                                                               */ 00792000

*   RFY                                                            0297 00795000

         LA    REG0,2124                                           0302 00811000
*       GEN(FREEMAIN RC,LV=(0),A=(1),SP=241);                      0303 00812000
