         L     @11,EPADSLST(,EPAPTR)                               0320 00849000
         CR    @11,@12                                             0320 00850000
         BE    @RF00320                                            0320 00851000
*     DO;                           /* FREE STORAGE FOR DATA SET NAME   00852000
*                                      LIST                          */ 00853000
*       REG1=EPADSLST;              /* ADDR OF AREA                  */ 00854000
         LR    REG1,@11                                            0322 00855000
*       EPADSLST=0;                                                0323 00856000
         ST    @12,EPADSLST(,EPAPTR)                               0323 00857000
*       REG0=LENGTH(TPAEDSN)*(PARTSIZE+SARSIZE);/* GET LENGTH        */ 00858000
         L     @12,ASMPART(,ASMVTPTR)                              0324 00859000
         L     @11,ASMSART(,ASMVTPTR)                              0324 00860000
         L     REG0,PARTSIZE(,@12)                                 0324 00861000
         AL    REG0,SARSIZE(,@11)                                  0324 00862000
         MH    REG0,@CH01244                                       0324 00863000
*       GEN(FREEMAIN RC,LV=(0),A=(1),SP=241);                      0325 00864000
         FREEMAIN RC,LV=(0),A=(1),SP=241                                00865000
*     END;                                                         0326 00866000
*   PARTTPAR=0;                     /* GET RID OF PTR TO PAGE DATA 0327 00867000
*                                      SET NAME LIST                 */ 00868000
@RF00320 SLR   @12,@12                                             0327 00869000
         L     @11,ASMPART(,ASMVTPTR)                              0327 00870000
         ST    @12,PARTTPAR(,@11)                                  0327 00871000
*   SARDSNL=0;                      /* GET RID OF PTR TO SWAP DATA 0328 00872000
*                                      SET NAME LIST                 */ 00873000
         L     @11,ASMSART(,ASMVTPTR)                              0328 00874000
         ST    @12,SARDSNL(,@11)                                   0328 00875000
*   EPATMXIT=BITON;                 /* INDICATE TMI IS FINISH        */ 00876000
*   EPATMI=BITOFF;                  /* TURN OFF TRACKING FLAG        */ 00877000
*   EPAWARM=BITOFF;                 /* MAKE SURE TRACKING FLAG IS OFF*/ 00878000
         OI    EPATMXIT(EPAPTR),B'10000000'                        0331 00879000
         NI    EPATMI(EPAPTR),B'10111011'                          0331 00880000
*   REG1=SDWAPTR;                   /* RELOAD SDWA BASE              */ 00881000
         L     REG1,SDWAPTR                                        0332 00882000
*   SDWASR06=EPAMSECB;              /* RETRY POINT ILRCRTM5 REQUIRES    00883000
*                                      REG6 ->ECB                    */ 00884000
         MVC   SDWASR06(4,REG1),EPAMSECB(EPAPTR)                   0333 00885000
*   RFY                                                            0334 00886000
*     RTYAREG RSTD;                                                0334 00887000
*   RTYAREG=ADDR(ILRCRTM5);         /* PUT RETRY ADDR IN REG FOR   0335 00888000
*                                      SETRP                         */ 00889000
         L     RTYAREG,@CV02102                                    0335 00890000
*   GOTO ENTRTMR5;                  /* GO RETRY AT ILRCRTM5 IN TMRLG */ 00891000
         B     ENTRTMR5                                            0336 00892000
*   RFY                                                            0337 00893000
*     RTYAREG UNRSTD;                                              0337 00894000
*                                                                  0338 00895000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00896000
*   /*                                                               */ 00897000
*   /* NOW SET UP TO RETRY IN ILRTMRLG                               */ 00898000
*   /*                                                               */ 00899000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00900000
*                                                                  0338 00901000
*   RFY                                                            0338 00902000
*     RTYAREG RSTD;                                                0338 00903000
*MAINRTRY:                                                         0339 00904000
*   RTYAREG=ADDR(ILRCRTM1);         /* MOVE RETRY ADDR TO REG        */ 00905000
*                                                                  0339 00906000
MAINRTRY L     RTYAREG,@CV02101                                    0339 00907000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00908000
*   /*                                                               */ 00909000
*   /* THE FOLLOWING LABEL WILL BE BRANCHED TO (GOTO) AFTER SET UP   */ 00910000
*   /* FOR RETRY AT ILRCRTM5 IN TMRLG. THE FOLLOWING SETUP IS        */ 00911000
*   /* REQUIRED TO RETRY AT BOTH ILRCRTM1 AND ILRCRTM5               */ 00912000
*   /*                                                               */ 00913000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00914000
*                                                                  0340 00915000
*ENTRTMR5:                                                         0340 00916000
*   ;                                                              0340 00917000
ENTRTMR5 DS    0H                                                  0341 00918000
*   SDWASR03=ASMVTPTR;              /* ASMVT ADDR IN REG 3           */ 00919000
         ST    ASMVTPTR,SDWASR03(,REG1)                            0341 00920000
*   SDWASR04=EPAPTR;                /* EPATH ADDR FOR REG 4          */ 00921000
         ST    EPAPTR,SDWASR04(,REG1)                              0342 00922000
*   SDWASR09=EPAOWKA;               /* WORK AREA BASE FOR TMRLG      */ 00923000
         MVC   SDWASR09(4,REG1),EPAOWKA(EPAPTR)                    0343 00924000
*   SDWASR10=ILRCBTM1;              /* REG 10 IS CODE REG FOR TMRLG  */ 00925000
         L     @12,@CA02100                                        0344 00926000
         MVC   SDWASR10(4,REG1),ILRCBTM1-ILRCBTM1(@12)             0344 00927000
*   SDWASR13=EPATMRSV;              /* REG SAVE AREA FOR TMRLG       */ 00928000
*                                                                  0345 00929000
         MVC   SDWASR13(4,REG1),EPATMRSV(EPAPTR)                   0345 00930000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00931000
*   /*                                                               */ 00932000
*   /* FOLLOWING LABEL CAN BE BRANCHED TO FOR RETRY OTHER THAN IN    */ 00933000
*   /* ILRTMRLG                                                      */ 00934000
*   /*                                                               */ 00935000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00936000
*                                                                  0346 00937000
*TMSETRP:                                                          0346 00938000
*   ;                                                              0346 00939000
TMSETRP  DS    0H                                                  0347 00940000
*   DO;                             /* SETRP RC(4)FRESDWA(YES)RETREGS   00941000
*                                      (YES)RETADDR(RTYADDR)         */ 00942000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0348 00943000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0348 00944000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0348 00945000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0348 00946000
*       GPR15P) RSTD;                                              0348 00947000
*     GPR01P->SDWARCDE=4;           /* STORE RC INTO SDWA            */ 00948000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'04'                              0349 00949000
*     GPR01P->SDWARTYA=ADDR(RTYADDR);/* SAVE RETRY ADDRESS           */ 00950000
         ST    RTYAREG,SDWARTYA(,GPR01P)                           0350 00951000
*     GPR01P->SDWAFREE='1'B;        /* SET FLAG TO FREE SDWA         */ 00952000
*     GPR01P->SDWAUPRG='1'B;        /* TURN ON RETREGS INDICATOR     */ 00953000
         OI    SDWAFREE(GPR01P),B'00001100'                        0352 00954000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0353 00955000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0353 00956000
*       GPR01P,                                                    0353 00957000
*       GPR14P,                                                    0353 00958000
*       GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                            0353 00959000
*   END;                                                           0354 00960000
*                                                                  0354 00961000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00962000
*   /*                                                               */ 00963000
*   /* FREE WORK AREA GOTTEN BY TMI01                                */ 00964000
*   /*                                                               */ 00965000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00966000
*                                                                  0355 00967000
*   GEN;                                                           0355 00968000
*                                                                  0355 00969000
         L     REG13,TMRSAVE+4   GET RTM SAVE AREA ADDR                 00970000
         L     REG0,@SIZDATD     GET LENGTH OF AREA                     00971000
         LR    REG1,PTRDATD      GET ADDR OF AREA                       00972000
         FREEMAIN RC,LV=(0),A=(1),SP=255                                00973000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00974000
*   /*                                                               */ 00975000
*   /* RESTORE REGS AND RETURN                                       */ 00976000
*   /*                                                               */ 00977000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00978000
*                                                                  0356 00979000
*   GEN;                                                           0356 00980000
         LM    REG14,REG12,12(REG13)                                    00981000
         BR    REG14                                                    00982000
*MSGPROC:                                                          0357 00983000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0357 00984000
*                                                                  0357 00985000
         B     @PB00002                                            0357 00986000
MSGPROC  DS    0H                                                  0358 00987000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00988000
*   /*                                                               */ 00989000
*   /* THIS PROCEDURE ISSUES MESSAGES TO THE OPERATOR VIA WTO AND    */ 00990000
*   /* WTOR. IF MESSAGE ILR022A IS ISSUED AND THE OPERATOR REPLIES,  */ 00991000
*   /* ASMNOTMR IS SET ON AND ASMNOLCL IS TURNED OFF                 */ 00992000
*   /*                                                               */ 00993000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00994000
*                                                                  0358 00995000
*   RFY                                                            0358 00996000
*     REG14 RSTD;                                                  0358 00997000
*   IF MSGREQ=MSGREQ4 THEN                                         0359 00998000
         CLC   MSGREQ(2),@CH00093                                  0359 00999000
         BNE   @RF00359                                            0359 01000000
*     DO;                           /* WTOP MF(E,MSG04)              */ 01001000
*       RFY                                                        0361 01002000
*         GPR01P RSTD;              /* RESTRICT REG 1                */ 01003000
*       GPR01P=ADDR(MSG04);         /* ADDRESS CONTROL PROGRAM LIST  */ 01004000
         LA    GPR01P,MSG04                                        0362 01005000
*       SVC(35);                    /* ISSUE WTO SVC                 */ 01006000
         SVC   35                                                  0363 01007000
*       RFY                                                        0364 01008000
*         GPR01P UNRSTD;            /* RELEASE REG 1                 */ 01009000
*     END;                          /* WTOP MF(E,MSG04) ISSUE MSG  0365 01010000
*                                      ILR004I                       */ 01011000
*   ELSE                                                           0366 01012000
*     DO;                                                          0366 01013000
         B     @RC00359                                            0366 01014000
@RF00359 DS    0H                                                  0367 01015000
*       IF MSGREQ=MSGREQ2 THEN                                     0367 01016000
         CLC   MSGREQ(2),@CH00090                                  0367 01017000
         BNE   @RF00367                                            0367 01018000
*         DO;                       /* WTOP MF(E,MSG02)              */ 01019000
*           RFY                                                    0369 01020000
*             GPR01P RSTD;          /* RESTRICT REG 1                */ 01021000
*           GPR01P=ADDR(MSG02);     /* ADDRESS CONTROL PROGRAM LIST  */ 01022000
         LA    GPR01P,MSG02                                        0370 01023000
*           SVC(35);                /* ISSUE WTO SVC                 */ 01024000
         SVC   35                                                  0371 01025000
*           RFY                                                    0372 01026000
*             GPR01P UNRSTD;        /* RELEASE REG 1                 */ 01027000
*         END;                      /* WTOP MF(E,MSG02) ISSUE MSG  0373 01028000
*                                      ILR002I                       */ 01029000
*       ELSE                        /* REQUEST IS FOR MSG 21I        */ 01030000
*         DO;                       /* WTOP MF(E,MSG21)              */ 01031000
         B     @RC00367                                            0374 01032000
@RF00367 DS    0H                                                  0375 01033000
*           RFY                                                    0375 01034000
*             GPR01P RSTD;          /* RESTRICT REG 1                */ 01035000
*           GPR01P=ADDR(MSG21);     /* ADDRESS CONTROL PROGRAM LIST  */ 01036000
         LA    GPR01P,MSG21                                        0376 01037000
*           SVC(35);                /* ISSUE WTO SVC                 */ 01038000
         SVC   35                                                  0377 01039000
*           RFY                                                    0378 01040000
*             GPR01P UNRSTD;        /* RELEASE REG 1                 */ 01041000
*         END;                      /* WTOP MF(E,MSG21) ISSUE MSG  0379 01042000
*                                      ILR021I                       */ 01043000
*       WTORECB=0;                  /* CLEAR WAIT ECB FOR REPLY      */ 01044000
@RC00367 SLR   @12,@12                                             0380 01045000
         ST    @12,WTORECB                                         0380 01046000
*       MSG22L(1:LENGTH(MSG22))=MSG22;/* MOVE WTOR LIST TO WORK AREA */ 01047000
         MVC   MSG22L(70),MSG22                                    0381 01048000
*       DO;                         /* WTORP(,REPLY,LENGTH(REPLY),WTO   01049000
*                                      RECB) MF(E,MSG22L)            */ 01050000
*         MSG22L01=LENGTH(REPLY);                                  0383 01051000
         MVI   MSG22L01,X'01'                                      0383 01052000
*         MSG22L02=ADDR(REPLY);                                    0384 01053000
         LA    @12,REPLY                                           0384 01054000
         STCM  @12,7,MSG22L02                                      0384 01055000
*         MSG22L03=ADDR(WTORECB);                                  0385 01056000
         LA    @12,WTORECB                                         0385 01057000
         ST    @12,MSG22L03                                        0385 01058000
*         RFY                                                      0386 01059000
*           GPR01P RSTD;            /* RESTRICT REG 1                */ 01060000
*         GPR01P=ADDR(MSG22L);      /* ADDRESS CONTROL PROGRAM LIST  */ 01061000
         LA    GPR01P,MSG22L                                       0387 01062000
*         SVC(35);                  /* ISSUE WTOR SVC                */ 01063000
         SVC   35                                                  0388 01064000
*         RFY                                                      0389 01065000
*           GPR01P UNRSTD;          /* RELEASE REG 1                 */ 01066000
*       END;                        /* WTORP(,REPLY,LENGTH(REPLY),WTO   01067000
*                                      RECB) MF(E,MSG22L) ISSUE    0390 01068000
*                                      ILR022A                       */ 01069000
*       DO;                         /* WAIT ECB(WTORECB)             */ 01070000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0392 01071000
*          (GPR00P,                                                0392 01072000
*           GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                    0392 01073000
*         GPR00P=1;                 /* LOAD WAIT COUNT               */ 01074000
         LA    GPR00P,1                                            0393 01075000
*         GPR01P=ADDR(WTORECB);     /* ADDRESS OF ECB                */ 01076000
         LA    GPR01P,WTORECB                                      0394 01077000
*         SVC(1);                   /* WAIT SVC                      */ 01078000
         SVC   1                                                   0395 01079000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0396 01080000
*          (GPR00P,                                                0396 01081000
*           GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                  0396 01082000
*       END;                        /* WAIT ECB(WTORECB) WAIT FOR  0397 01083000
*                                      REPLY                         */ 01084000
*       ASMNOTMR=BITON;             /* INDICATE NO ACTIVE TMRLG TASK */ 01085000
         OI    ASMNOTMR(ASMVTPTR),B'00100000'                      0398 01086000
*       ASMNOLCL=BITOFF;            /* MAKE LOCAL PAGE DATA SETS   0399 01087000
*                                      AVAILABLE                     */ 01088000
         NI    ASMNOLCL(ASMVTPTR),B'11011111'                      0399 01089000
*     END;                                                         0400 01090000
*   REG1=SDWAPTR;                   /* REG1 WAS DESTROYED            */ 01091000
@RC00359 L     REG1,SDWAPTR                                        0401 01092000
*   RETURN;                                                        0402 01093000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0402 01094000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0402 01095000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0402 01096000
*   RFY                                                            0403 01097000
*     REG14 UNRSTD;                                                0403 01098000
*   END MSGPROC;                                                   0404 01099000
*                                                                  0405 01100000
*/*  MACCOMP Y-4SC1CW/PZD81                                          */ 01101000
*/*  MACSTAT Y-475082/415304                                         */ 01102000
*/********************************************************************/ 01103000
*/*                                                                  */ 01104000
*/*  NAME:  ILRAFS00                                                 */ 01105000
*/*                                                                  */ 01106000
*/*  STATUS:  OS/VS2 RELEASE 4.1, LEVEL 0                            */ 01107000
*/*                                                                  */ 01108000
*/*  ENTRY POINT:  ILRAFS00                                          */ 01109000
*/*                                                                  */ 01110000
*/*  FUNCTION:  THIS SUBROUTINE FREES AN ASPCT.                      */ 01111000
*/*                                                                  */ 01112000
*/*  INPUT:  ADDRESS OF ASPCT IN REGISTER 1.                         */ 01113000
*/*          LENGTH OF ASPCT IN REGISTER 0.                          */ 01114000
*/*                                                                  */ 01115000
*/*  PROCESS:  TWO LOOPS, ONE TO FREE ASST EXTENSIONS AND ONE TO     */ 01116000
*/*            FREE LPME EXTENSIONS, ARE EXECUTED.  EACH USES THE    */ 01117000
*/*            SUBROUTINE AFSFREE TO INVOKE FREEMAIN.  A FINAL CALL  */ 01118000
*/*            TO AFSFREE FREES THE BASE ASPCT EXTN.                 */ 01119000
*/*                                                                  */ 01120000
*/*  OUTPUT:  RETURN CODE IN REGISTER 15.                            */ 01121000
*/*             00 = NORMAL RETURN                                   */ 01122000
*/*             44 = FREEMAIN FAILURE                                */ 01123000
*/*                                                                  */ 01124000
*/*  EXIT-NORMAL:  RETURN TO CALLER WITH RETURN CODE (SEE OUTPUT)    */ 01125000
*/*                                                                  */ 01126000
*/*  EXIT-ERROR:  NONE                                               */ 01127000
*/*                                                                  */ 01128000
*/*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES:  FREEMAIN                                  */ 01129000
*/*                                                                  */ 01130000
*/*  REGISTERS CLOBBERED:  0 AND 1, 14 AND 15                        */ 01131000
*/*                                                                  */ 01132000
*/*  MAPPING MACROS USED:  ILRASPCT                                  */ 01133000
*/*                                                                  */ 01134000
*/*  NOTES:  DUE TO PLS OPTIMIZATION, RESTRICT ALL NECESSARY         */ 01135000
*/*          REGISTERS AROUND THIS ROUTINE.                          */ 01136000
*/*          INVOKING ROUTINE MUST HOLD THE LOCAL LOCK, OR HAVE      */ 01137000
*/*          SPECIFIED %AFSSVC=YES.                                  */ 01138000
*/*          ALL LABELS AND DATA AREAS CREATED BY THIS ROUTINE BEGIN */ 01139000
*/*          WITH THE THREE CHARACTERS 'AFS'.  THE CALLING MODULE    */ 01140000
*/*          MUST INCLUDE SUFFICIENT WORKSPACE FOR THIS ROUTINE'S    */ 01141000
*/*          DATA AREAS.  THIS AMOUNT IS COMPILER DEPENDENT WITH A   */ 01142000
*/*          MAXIMUM REQUIREMENT OF 46 BYTES.  THIS ROUTINE ALSO     */ 01143000
*/*          REQUIRES THAT THE CALLING MODULE DECLARES REGISTERS     */ 01144000
*/*          R0-R15.  THE MAPPING MACRO LISTED ABOVE MUST BE         */ 01145000
*/*          INCLUDED.  THE BASE POINTER FOR THE ASPCT IS NOT        */ 01146000
*/*          REQUIRED BY THIS SUBROUTINE.                            */ 01147000
*/*                                                                  */ 01148000
*/*  METHOD OF ACCESS:                                               */ 01149000
*/*          %AFSSVC='YES' IF THE INVOKING ROUTINE MUST USE AN SVC   */ 01150000
*/*          %AFSSVC='NO' IF BRANCH ENTRY REQUIRED                   */ 01151000
*/*          %INCLUDE SYSLIB(ILRAFS00)                               */ 01152000
*/********************************************************************/ 01153000
*/*ILRAFS00: CHART (AREF)                                            */ 01154000
*/*HEADER                                                          0405 01155000
*/*            ILRAFS00 - FREE ASPCT STORAGE                         */ 01156000
*/*ILRAFS00: E ENTRY                                                 */ 01157000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 01158000
*/*         P  SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE                                */ 01159000
*/*         P  SAVE THE LENGTH OF ASPCT                              */ 01160000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS01A) SPECIFIED LENGTH THAT OF ASPCT?     */ 01161000
*/*         P  (,%AFS01B) SET SUBPOOL ID TO 255                      */ 01162000
*/*%AFS01A: P  SET SUBPOOL ID TO 230                                 */ 01163000
*/*%AFS01B: D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?            */ 01164000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE                */ 01165000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO TWO            */ 01166000
*/*%AFS01:  P  GET PTR TO ASST EXTENSION                             */ 01167000
*/*%AFS02:  P  GET PTR TO LPME EXTENSION                             */ 01168000
*/*%AFS02A: S  AFSFREE: FREE AN LPME EXTENSION                       */ 01169000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS03,NO,) RETURN CODE ZERO?                    */ 01170000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                */ 01171000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS04,NO,) REACHED END OF ASST EXT ARRAY?       */ 01172000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS04) ANYMORE LPME EXTENSIONS?             */ 01173000
*/*         P  SET PTR TO LPME EXTENSION                             */ 01174000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS02A,NO,%AFS04) IS THIS AN LPME EXTENSION?    */ 01175000
*/*%AFS03:  P  INCREMENT THE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                */ 01176000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS04,NO,) REACHED END OF ASST EXT ARRAY?       */ 01177000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS02,NO,) ANYMORE LPME EXTENSIONS?             */ 01178000
*/*%AFS04:  P  SET WORK PTR TO ASST EXT                              */ 01179000
*/*         S  AFSFREE: FREE AN ASST EXTENSION                       */ 01180000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS05,NO,) RETURN CODE ZERO?                    */ 01181000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                    */ 01182000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS06,NO,) REACHED END OF BASE ARRAY?           */ 01183000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ANYMORE ASST EXTENSIONS?             */ 01184000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO ASST EXTENSION                             */ 01185000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) IS THIS AN ASST EXTENSION            */ 01186000
*/*         P  (,%AFS02) RESET ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE       */ 01187000
*/*%AFS05:  P  INCREMENT THE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                    */ 01188000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS06,NO,) REACHED END OF BASE ARRAY            */ 01189000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ANYMORE ASST EXTENSIONS?             */ 01190000
*/*         P  (,%AFS01) RESET ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE       */ 01191000
*/*%AFS06:  P  SET THE WORK PTR TO ASPCT BASE                        */ 01192000
*/*         S  AFSFREE: FREE THE ASPCT BASE                          */ 01193000
*/*         R  RETURN TO CALLER                                      */ 01194000
*                                                                  0405 01195000
         EJECT                                                          01196000
*ILRAFS00:                                                         0405 01197000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0405 01198000
*                                                                  0405 01199000
ILRAFS00 DS    0H                                                  0406 01200000
*/*A-000000-999999                                           @Z40WPWH*/ 01201000
*                                                                  0406 01202000
*   DECLARE                                                        0406 01203000
*     AFSASPCT PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASPCT BASE             */ 01204000
*     AFSEXPTR PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASPCT EXTENSIONS       */ 01205000
*     AFSLNGTH FIXED(31),           /* FREEMAIN LENGTH               */ 01206000
*     AFSWORK PTR(31),              /* FREEMAIN ADDRESS              */ 01207000
*     AFSRET1 FIXED(31),            /* INTERNAL RETURN CODE          */ 01208000
*     AFSRET2 FIXED(31),            /* INTERNAL RETURN CODE          */ 01209000
*     AFSA FIXED(31),               /* ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT      */ 01210000
*     AFSSPID FIXED(31),            /* SUBPOOL ID FOR FREEMAIN       */ 01211000
*     AFSB FIXED(15),               /* BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 01212000
*     AFSZERO FIXED(31) CONSTANT(0),                               0406 01213000
*     AFSSP230 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(230),                            0406 01214000
*     AFSSP255 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(255),                            0406 01215000
*     AFS257 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(257),                              0406 01216000
*     AFSONE FIXED(15) CONSTANT(1),                                0406 01217000
*     AFS44 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(44),                                0406 01218000
*     AFSTWO FIXED(15) CONSTANT(2),                                0406 01219000
*     AFSFIVE FIXED(15) CONSTANT(5);                               0406 01220000
*   RFY                                                            0407 01221000
*    (R0,                                                          0407 01222000
*     R1,                                                          0407 01223000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0407 01224000
*   AFSRET1=R14;                    /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01225000
         ST    R14,AFSRET1                                         0408 01226000
*   AFSASPCT=R1;                    /* SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE        */ 01227000
         LR    AFSASPCT,R1                                         0409 01228000
*   AFSLNGTH=R0;                    /* SAVE INPUT LENGTH             */ 01229000
         ST    R0,AFSLNGTH                                         0410 01230000
*   RFY                                                            0411 01231000
*    (R0,                                                          0411 01232000
*     R1,                                                          0411 01233000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0411 01234000
*   IF AFSLNGTH=LENGTH(ASPCT)       /* CHECK WHICH SUBPOOL TO USE    */ 01235000
*     THEN                          /* ACTIVE ASPCT                  */ 01236000
         L     @14,AFSLNGTH                                        0412 01237000
         CH    @14,@CH02312                                        0412 01238000
         BNE   @RF00412                                            0412 01239000
*     AFSSPID=AFSSP255;             /* SET SUBPOOL FOR LSQA          */ 01240000
         MVC   AFSSPID(4),@CF02285                                 0413 01241000
*   ELSE                            /* I/O BUFFERS                   */ 01242000
*     AFSSPID=AFSSP230;             /* SET SUBPOOL FOR USER KEY      */ 01243000
         B     @RC00412                                            0414 01244000
@RF00412 MVC   AFSSPID(4),@CF02283                                 0414 01245000
         EJECT                                                          01246000
*                                                                  0415 01247000
*/********************************************************************/ 01248000
*/*                                                                  */ 01249000
*/*  A TEST IS NOW MADE FOR EXTENSIONS. IF THERE ARE EXTENSIONS,     */ 01250000
*/*  THEY ARE FREED FIRST. FIRST ALL LPME EXTENSIONS FOR A PARTICULAR*/ 01251000
*/*  ASST EXTENSION ARE FREED, THEN THAT ASST EXTENSION IS FREED.    */ 01252000
*/*  THIS PROCESS IS REPEATED UNTIL ALL EXTENSIONS ARE FREED.        */ 01253000
*/*                                                                  */ 01254000
*/********************************************************************/ 01255000
*                                                                  0415 01256000
*   IF AFSASPCT->ASPAEXCTÂ¬=AFSZERO  /* ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?     */ 01257000
*     THEN                                                         0415 01258000
@RC00412 ICM   @14,3,ASPAEXCT(AFSASPCT)                            0415 01259000
         BZ    @RF00415                                            0415 01260000
*     DO;                           /* YES                           */ 01261000
*       AFSB=AFSONE;                /* SET BASE SUBSCRIPT FOR FIRST     01262000
*                                      ASST EXTENSION                */ 01263000
         LA    AFSB,1                                              0417 01264000
*       AFSA=AFSTWO;                /* SET ASST SUBSCRIPT FOR FIRST     01265000
*                                      LPME EXTENSION OFF FIRST ASST    01266000
*                                      EXTENSION. GET PTR TO FIRST 0418 01267000
*                                      ASST EXT                      */ 01268000
         LA    AFSA,2                                              0418 01269000
*       AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);                         0419 01270000
         LR    @14,AFSB                                            0419 01271000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0419 01272000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@14,AFSASPCT)                   0419 01273000
*       DO WHILE AFSEXPTRÂ¬=AFSZERO; /* LOOP UNTIL WE HAVE PROCESSED     01274000
*                                      ALL ASST EXTENSIONS GET PTR TO   01275000
*                                      LPME EXT                      */ 01276000
         B     @DE00420                                            0420 01277000
@DL00420 DS    0H                                                  0421 01278000
*         AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);                        0421 01279000
         LR    @14,AFSA                                            0421 01280000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0421 01281000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@14,AFSEXPTR)                    0421 01282000
*         DO WHILE AFSWORKÂ¬=AFSZERO;/* LOOP UNTIL WE HAVE PROCESSED     01283000
*                                      ALL LPME EXTENSIONS FOR A   0422 01284000
*                                      PARTICULAR ASST EXTENSION     */ 01285000
         B     @DE00422                                            0422 01286000
@DL00422 DS    0H                                                  0423 01287000
*           CALL AFSFREE;           /* FREE AN LPME EXTENSION        */ 01288000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0423 01289000
*           RFY                                                    0424 01290000
*             R15 RSTD;                                            0424 01291000
*           IF R15=AFSZERO          /* SUCCESSFUL FREEMAIN?          */ 01292000
*             THEN                                                 0425 01293000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0425 01294000
         BNZ   @RF00425                                            0425 01295000
*             DO;                   /* YES                           */ 01296000
*               RFY                                                0427 01297000
*                 R15 UNRSTD;                                      0427 01298000
*               AFSA=AFSA+AFSONE;   /* INCREMENT ASST SUBSCRIPT      */ 01299000
         AH    AFSA,@CH00050                                       0428 01300000
*               IF AFSA<AFS257      /* REACHED END OF ARRAY          */ 01301000
*                 THEN              /* NO, GET PTR TO NEXT LPME EX   */ 01302000
         CH    AFSA,@CH02287                                       0429 01303000
         BNL   @RF00429                                            0429 01304000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);                0430 01305000
         LR    @14,AFSA                                            0430 01306000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0430 01307000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@14,AFSEXPTR)                    0430 01308000
*               ELSE                /* YES, FORCE EXIT FROM LOOP     */ 01309000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSZERO;                                 0431 01310000
         B     @RC00429                                            0431 01311000
@RF00429 SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0431 01312000
*             END;                  /* THIS IS THE LOGICAL END OF THE   01313000
*                                      DO WHILE LOOP FOR LPME      0432 01314000
*                                      EXTENSIONS. PHYSICAL END IS 0432 01315000
*                                      AFTER THE ERROR CODE PROCESS     01316000
*                                      ING FOR A NON-ZERO RETURN FROM   01317000
*                                      AFSFREE.                      */ 01318000
         EJECT                                                          01319000
*                                                                  0433 01320000
*/********************************************************************/ 01321000
*/* THIS SECTION WILL PROCESS A NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM AFSFREE    */ 01322000
*/* FOR LPME EXTENSIONS. PROCESSING CONSISTS OF GETTING THE POINTER  */ 01323000
*/* TO THE NEXT LPME EXTENSION, AND VERIFYING THAT IT IS AN LPME     */ 01324000
*/* EXTENSION. IF IT IS WE WILL CONTINUE FREEING LPME EXTENSIONS,    */ 01325000
*/* IF NOT, WE WILL FORCE AN EXIT FROM THE LOOP.                     */ 01326000
*/********************************************************************/ 01327000
*                                                                  0433 01328000
*           ELSE                                                   0433 01329000
*             DO;                   /* NON-ZERO RETURN FROM AFSFREE  */ 01330000
         B     @RC00425                                            0433 01331000
@RF00425 DS    0H                                                  0434 01332000
*               AFSA=AFSA+AFSONE;   /* INCREMENT ASST SUBSCRIPT      */ 01333000
         AH    AFSA,@CH00050                                       0434 01334000
*               IF AFSA<AFS257      /* REACHED END OF ASST ARRAY?    */ 01335000
*                 THEN                                             0435 01336000
         CH    AFSA,@CH02287                                       0435 01337000
         BNL   @RF00435                                            0435 01338000
*                 DO;               /* NO GET PTR TO NEXT LPME EXT   */ 01339000
*                   AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);/* IS THIS A  0437 01340000
*                                      VALID LPME EXT?               */ 01341000
         LR    @14,AFSA                                            0437 01342000
         SLA   @14,2                                               0437 01343000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@14,AFSEXPTR)                    0437 01344000
*                   IF AFSWORK->ASPEIDNTÂ¬='LPME' THEN/* NO           */ 01345000
         CLC   ASPEIDNT(4,AFSWORK),@CC02293                        0438 01346000
         BE    @RF00438                                            0438 01347000
*                     AFSWORK=AFSZERO;/* FORCE LOOP EXIT             */ 01348000
         SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0439 01349000
*                 END;                                             0440 01350000
*               ELSE                /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01351000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSZERO;  /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01352000
         B     @RC00435                                            0441 01353000
@RF00435 SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0441 01354000
*             END;                                                 0442 01355000
@RC00435 DS    0H                                                  0443 01356000
*         END;                      /* THIS IS THE PHYSICAL END OF 0443 01357000
*                                      THE DO WHILE LOOP FOR LPME  0443 01358000
*                                      EXTENSIONS.                   */ 01359000
@RC00425 DS    0H                                                  0443 01360000
@DE00422 LTR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0443 01361000
         BNZ   @DL00422                                            0443 01362000
         EJECT                                                          01363000
*                                                                  0444 01364000
*/********************************************************************/ 01365000
*/* THIS SECTION PROCESSES THE ASST EXTENSIONS                       */ 01366000
*/********************************************************************/ 01367000
*                                                                  0444 01368000
*         AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR;         /* SET FREEMAIN POINTER TO AN  0444 01369000
*                                      ASST EXTENSION                */ 01370000
         LR    AFSWORK,AFSEXPTR                                    0444 01371000
*         CALL AFSFREE;             /* FREE THE ASST EXTENSION       */ 01372000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0445 01373000
*         RFY                                                      0446 01374000
*           R15 RSTD;                                              0446 01375000
*         IF R15=AFSZERO            /* FREEMAIN SUCCESSFUL?          */ 01376000
*           THEN                                                   0447 01377000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0447 01378000
         BNZ   @RF00447                                            0447 01379000
*           DO;                     /* YES                           */ 01380000
*             RFY                                                  0449 01381000
*               R15 UNRSTD;                                        0449 01382000
*             AFSB=AFSB+AFSONE;     /* INCREMENT BASE SUBSCRIPT      */ 01383000
         LA    @14,1                                               0450 01384000
         ALR   AFSB,@14                                            0450 01385000
*             IF AFSB<AFSFIVE       /* REACHED END OF ARRAY?         */ 01386000
*               THEN                                               0451 01387000
         CH    AFSB,@CH01157                                       0451 01388000
         BNL   @RF00451                                            0451 01389000
*               DO;                 /* NO GET PTR TO NEXT ASST EXT   */ 01390000
*                 AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);               0453 01391000
         LR    @08,AFSB                                            0453 01392000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0453 01393000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@08,AFSASPCT)                   0453 01394000
*                 AFSA=AFSONE;      /* RESET ASST SUBSCRIPT          */ 01395000
         LR    AFSA,@14                                            0454 01396000
*               END;                                               0455 01397000
*             ELSE                  /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01398000
*               AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;   /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01399000
         B     @RC00451                                            0456 01400000
@RF00451 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0456 01401000
*           END;                    /* THIS THE LOGICAL END OF THE DO   01402000
*                                      WHILE LOOP FOR ASST         0457 01403000
*                                      EXTENSIONS. PHYSICAL END IS 0457 01404000
*                                      AFTER THE ERROR CODE PROCESS     01405000
*                                      ING FOR A NON-ZERO RETURN FROM   01406000
*                                      AFSFREE                       */ 01407000
         EJECT                                                          01408000
*                                                                  0458 01409000
*/********************************************************************/ 01410000
*/* THIS SECTION WILL PROCESS A NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM AFSFREE    */ 01411000
*/* FOR ASST EXTENSIONS. PROCESSING CONSISTS OF GETTING THE POINTER  */ 01412000
*/* TO THE NEXT ASST EXTENSION, AND VERIFYING THAT IT IS AN ASST     */ 01413000
*/* EXTENSION. IF IT IS WE WILL CONTINUE FREEING ASST EXTENSIONS,    */ 01414000
*/* IF NOT, WE WILL FORCE AN EXIT FROM THE LOOP.                     */ 01415000
*/********************************************************************/ 01416000
*                                                                  0458 01417000
*         ELSE                                                     0458 01418000
*           DO;                     /* NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM   0458 01419000
*                                      AFSFREE                       */ 01420000
         B     @RC00447                                            0458 01421000
@RF00447 DS    0H                                                  0459 01422000
*             AFSB=AFSB+AFSONE;     /* INCREMENT BASE SUBSCRIPT      */ 01423000
         LA    @14,1                                               0459 01424000
         ALR   AFSB,@14                                            0459 01425000
*             IF AFSB<AFSFIVE       /* REACHED END OF ARRAY          */ 01426000
*               THEN                                               0460 01427000
         CH    AFSB,@CH01157                                       0460 01428000
         BNL   @RF00460                                            0460 01429000
*               DO;                 /* GET PTR TO NEXT ASST          */ 01430000
*                 AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);/* VALID ASST  0462 01431000
*                                      EXTENSION?                    */ 01432000
         LR    @08,AFSB                                            0462 01433000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0462 01434000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@08,AFSASPCT)                   0462 01435000
*                 IF AFSEXPTR->ASPEIDNT='ASST' THEN/* YES            */ 01436000
         CLC   ASPEIDNT(4,AFSEXPTR),@CC02294                       0463 01437000
         BNE   @RF00463                                            0463 01438000
*                   AFSA=AFSONE;    /* RESET ASST SUBSCRIPT          */ 01439000
         LR    AFSA,@14                                            0464 01440000
*                 ELSE              /* NO                            */ 01441000
*                   AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;/* FORCE LOOP EXIT              */ 01442000
         B     @RC00463                                            0465 01443000
@RF00463 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0465 01444000
*               END;                                               0466 01445000
*             ELSE                  /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01446000
*               AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;   /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01447000
         B     @RC00460                                            0467 01448000
@RF00460 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0467 01449000
*           END;                                                   0468 01450000
@RC00460 DS    0H                                                  0469 01451000
*       END;                        /* PHYSICAL END OF DO WHILE LOOP    01452000
*                                      FOR ASST EXTENSIONS           */ 01453000
@RC00447 DS    0H                                                  0469 01454000
@DE00420 LTR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0469 01455000
         BNZ   @DL00420                                            0469 01456000
*     END;                                                         0470 01457000
         EJECT                                                          01458000
*                                                                  0471 01459000
*/********************************************************************/ 01460000
*/* THIS SECTION FREES THE ASPCT BASE                                */ 01461000
*/********************************************************************/ 01462000
*                                                                  0471 01463000
*   AFSWORK=AFSASPCT;               /* GET PTR TO THE ASPCT BASE     */ 01464000
@RF00415 LR    AFSWORK,AFSASPCT                                    0471 01465000
*   CALL AFSFREE;                   /* FREE THE BASE                 */ 01466000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0472 01467000
*   RFY                                                            0473 01468000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0473 01469000
*   R14=AFSRET1;                    /* GET RETURN ADDRESS            */ 01470000
         L     R14,AFSRET1                                         0474 01471000
*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01472000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0475 01473000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0475 01474000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 0475 01475000
*   RFY                                                            0476 01476000
*     R14 UNRSTD;                                                  0476 01477000
         EJECT                                                          01478000
         EJECT                                                          01479000
*                                                                  0477 01480000
*/********************************************************************/ 01481000
*/*                                                                  */ 01482000
*/*  AFSFREE:  FREE ASPCT EXTN OF STORAGE                            */ 01483000
*/*                                                                  */ 01484000
*/*  INPUT:  ADDRESS OF EXTN IN REGISTER 1                           */ 01485000
*/*                                                                  */ 01486000
*/*  PROCESS:  SET UP REGS, ISSUE FREEMAIN MACRO TO FREE ASPCT EXTN. */ 01487000
*/*                                                                  */ 01488000
*/*  OUTPUT:  RETURN CODE IN REGISTER 15                             */ 01489000
*/*             00 - NORMAL RETURN                                   */ 01490000
*/*             44 - FREEMAIN RETURNED ERROR CODE                    */ 01491000
*/*                                                                  */ 01492000
*/********************************************************************/ 01493000
*/*AFSFREE: CHART (AREF)                                             */ 01494000
*/*HEADER                                                          0477 01495000
*/*  ILRAFS00                                                      0477 01496000
*/* AFSFREE - FREEMAIN THE ASPCT                                     */ 01497000
*/*AFSFREE: E  ENTRY                                                 */ 01498000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 01499000
*/*         N  THIS NEXT TEST AND RESULTING LEGS OF CODE, IS A MACRO */ 01500000
*/*         N  PASS TEST AND EXPANSION.                              */ 01501000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS07) SVC OK?                              */ 01502000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 14 WITH SUBPOOL ID                           */ 01503000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 0 WITH LENGTH                                */ 01504000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH ADDRESS OF AREA TO BE FREED           */ 01505000
*/*         S  (,%AFS08) FREEMAIN: FREE THE ASPCT                    */ 01506000
*/*%AFS07:  P  LOAD REG 0 WITH LENTH                                 */ 01507000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH ADDRESS OF AREA TO BE FREED           */ 01508000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 4 WITH CURRENT TCB ADDRESS                   */ 01509000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 7 WITH CURRENT ASCB ADDRESS                  */ 01510000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 3 WITH SUBPOOL ID                            */ 01511000
*/*         S  IEAVGM00: FREE THE ASPCT                              */ 01512000
*/*%AFS08:  D  (YES,%AFS09,NO,) ZERO RETURN CODE?                    */ 01513000
*/*         P  SAVE FREEMAINS RETURN CODE                            */ 01514000
*/*         P  SET RETURN CODE TO 68                                 */ 01515000
*/*%AFS09:  R  RETURN TO MAINLINE                                    */ 01516000
*                                                                  0477 01517000
         EJECT                                                          01518000
*AFSFREE:                           /* FREEMAIN AN EXTN OF ASPCT     */ 01519000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0477 01520000
AFSFREE  DS    0H                                                  0478 01521000
*   RFY                                                            0478 01522000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0478 01523000
*   AFSRET2=R14;                    /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01524000
         ST    R14,AFSRET2                                         0479 01525000
*   RFY                                                            0480 01526000
*    (R0,                                                          0480 01527000
*     R1,                                                          0480 01528000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0480 01529000
*   R14=AFSSPID;                    /* GET SUBPOOL ID                */ 01530000
         L     R14,AFSSPID                                         0481 01531000
*   R0=AFSLNGTH;                    /* GET LENGTH OF AREA TO FREE    */ 01532000
         L     R0,AFSLNGTH                                         0482 01533000
*   R1=AFSWORK;                     /* GET ADDRESS OF AREA TO FREE   */ 01534000
         LR    R1,AFSWORK                                          0483 01535000
*   GENERATE REFS(R0,R1,R14);                                      0484 01536000
         FREEMAIN RC,A=(1),LV=(0),SP=(14)                               01537000
*   RFY                                                            0485 01538000
*    (R0,                                                          0485 01539000
*     R1,                                                          0485 01540000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0485 01541000
*   RFY                                                            0486 01542000
*    (R14,                                                         0486 01543000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   0486 01544000
*   IF R15Â¬=AFSZERO                 /* FREEMAIN SUCCESSFUL?          */ 01545000
*     THEN                          /* NO                            */ 01546000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0487 01547000
         BZ    @RF00487                                            0487 01548000
*     R15=AFS44;                    /* SET RETURN CODE TO 44         */ 01549000
         LA    R15,44                                              0488 01550000
*   R14=AFSRET2;                    /* GET RETURN ADDRESS            */ 01551000
@RF00487 L     R14,AFSRET2                                         0489 01552000
*   RFY                                                            0490 01553000
*    (R14,                                                         0490 01554000
*     R15) UNRSTD;                                                 0490 01555000
*   END AFSFREE;                                                   0491 01556000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0491 01557000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0491 01558000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0491 01559000
*   END ILRAFS00;                                                  0492 01560000
@PB00003 DS    0H                                                  0493 01561000
*NOSDWA:                                                           0493 01562000
*   ;                                                              0493 01563000
*                                                                  0493 01564000
NOSDWA   DS    0H                                                  0494 01565000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01566000
*   /*                                                               */ 01567000
*   /* RTM DID NOT PASS A SDWA, REG 2 POINTS TO THE EPATH            */ 01568000
*   /*                                                               */ 01569000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01570000
*                                                                  0494 01571000
*   RFY                                                            0494 01572000
*    (REG2,                                                        0494 01573000
*     REG14,                                                       0494 01574000
*     REG15) RSTD;                                                 0494 01575000
*   RFY                                                            0495 01576000
*     EPATH BASED(REG2);                                           0495 01577000
*   ASMVTPTR=CVTASMVT;              /* GET ADDR OF ASMVT             */ 01578000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0496 01579000
         L     ASMVTPTR,CVTASMVT(,@12)                             0496 01580000
*   IF ASMNOTMR=BITON|              /* NO TMRLG INDICATOR ON         */ 01581000
*       EPARECUR=BITON|             /* OR RECURSION FROM TMRLG       */ 01582000
*       EPAMAST=BITOFF THEN         /* OR M.S.I. NOT POSTED          */ 01583000
         TM    ASMNOTMR(ASMVTPTR),B'00100000'                      0497 01584000
         BO    @RT00497                                            0497 01585000
         TM    EPARECUR(REG2),B'00000010'                          0497 01586000
         BNZ   @RT00497                                            0497 01587000
         TM    EPAMAST(REG2),B'00001000'                           0497 01588000
         BO    @RF00497                                            0497 01589000
@RT00497 DS    0H                                                  0498 01590000
*     DO;                           /* THINGS ARE TOO SHAKY TO RETRY    01591000
*                                      SO TERMINATE                  */ 01592000
*       ASMNOTMR=BITON;             /* MAKE SURE NO TMRLG INDICATOR     01593000
*                                      IS ON                         */ 01594000
         OI    ASMNOTMR(ASMVTPTR),B'00100000'                      0499 01595000
*       REG15=0;                    /* INDICATE CONTINUE WITH      0500 01596000
*                                      TERMINATION                   */ 01597000
         SLR   REG15,REG15                                         0500 01598000
*       RETURN;                     /* RETURN TO RTM TO CONTINUE   0501 01599000
*                                      TERMINATION                   */ 01600000
@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0501 01601000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0501 01602000
@ER00001 BR    @14                                                 0501 01603000
*     END;                                                         0502 01604000
*   ELSE                            /* TMRLG MAIN ACE FUNCTION WAS 0503 01605000
*                                      PROCESSING                    */ 01606000
*                                                                  0503 01607000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01608000
*     /*                                                             */ 01609000
*     /* RESET THE FOLLOWING FIELDS SO LOOP WILL NOT OCCUR           */ 01610000
*     /*                                                             */ 01611000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01612000
*                                                                  0503 01613000
*     EPARECUR=BITON;               /* IF TMRLG PROCESSES THE NEXT 0503 01614000
*                                      ACE THIS IS TURNED OFF        */ 01615000
@RF00497 OI    EPARECUR(REG2),B'00000010'                          0503 01616000
*   EPARPLB=BITOFF;                 /* RESET INDICATION THAT VSAMI 0504 01617000
*                                      HAS BUILT ITS RPL             */ 01618000
*   EPAVSAMI=BITOFF;                                               0505 01619000
         NI    EPARPLB(REG2),B'01111110'                           0505 01620000
*   EPAVWKA=0;                      /* GET RID OF VSAMI WORK AREA IF    01621000
*                                      THERE WAS ONE                 */ 01622000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0506 01623000
         ST    @12,EPAVWKA(,REG2)                                  0506 01624000
*   EPABASP=0;                      /* PTR TO IO BUFFER              */ 01625000
         ST    @12,EPABASP(,REG2)                                  0507 01626000
*   EPARASP=0;                      /* PTR TO CHAIN OF IO BUFFERS OF    01627000
*                                      RETRIEVED ASPCT'S             */ 01628000
         ST    @12,EPARASP(,REG2)                                  0508 01629000
*   EPAACE=0;                       /* PTR TO CURRENT ACE            */ 01630000
         ST    @12,EPAACE(,REG2)                                   0509 01631000
*   ASMRLGWQ=0;                     /* THROW AWAY WORK CHAIN OF ACE'S*/ 01632000
*                                                                  0510 01633000
         ST    @12,ASMRLGWQ(,ASMVTPTR)                             0510 01634000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01635000
*   /*                                                               */ 01636000
*   /* NOW SETUP TO CAUSE RETRY IN THIS MODULE                       */ 01637000
*   /*                                                               */ 01638000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01639000
*                                                                  0511 01640000
*   RFY                                                            0511 01641000
*     REG0 RSTD;                                                   0511 01642000
*   REG0=ADDR(ILRCRTMX);                                           0512 01643000
         LA    REG0,ILRCRTMX                                       0512 01644000
*   REG15=4;                                                       0513 01645000
*                                                                  0513 01646000
         LA    REG15,4                                             0513 01647000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01648000
*   /*                                                               */ 01649000
*   /* RETURN TO RTM WHO WILL RETRY AT ILRCRTMX. REGISTERS WILL THEN */ 01650000
*   /* BE SET UP TO BRANCH TO THE RETRY POINT, ILRCRTM1, IN TMRLG.   */ 01651000
*   /* THIS IS DONE BECAUSE WITHOUT A SDWA THERE IS NO WAY TO TELL   */ 01652000
*   /* RTM TO RETRY WITH UPDATED REGS                                */ 01653000
*   /*                                                               */ 01654000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01655000
*                                                                  0514 01656000
*   RETURN;                                                        0514 01657000
         B     @EL00001                                            0514 01658000
*   RFY                                                            0515 01659000
*    (REG0,                                                        0515 01660000
*     REG2,                                                        0515 01661000
*     REG14) UNRSTD;                                               0515 01662000
*                                                                  0515 01663000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01664000
*   /*                                                               */ 01665000
*   /* THIS CODE MUST BE LAST SINCE IT USES A DIFFERENT BASE REG     */ 01666000
*   /*                                                               */ 01667000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01668000
*                                                                  0516 01669000
*ILRCRTMX:                                                         0516 01670000
*   ;                               /* REGISTER 1 NOW POINTS TO THE     01671000
*                                      EPATH                         */ 01672000
ILRCRTMX DS    0H                                                  0517 01673000
*   GEN;                                                           0517 01674000
         USING ILRCRTMX,REG15                                           01675000
         DROP  BASEREG                                                  01676000
         DROP  PTRDATD                                                  01677000
*   RFY                                                            0518 01678000
*    (REG1,                                                        0518 01679000
*     REG9,                                                        0518 01680000
*     REG10) RSTD;                                                 0518 01681000
*   RFY                                                            0519 01682000
*     EPATH BASED(EPAPTR);                                         0519 01683000
*   ASMVTPTR=CVTASMVT;              /* GET PTR TO ASMVT              */ 01684000
         L     @14,CVTPTR                                          0520 01685000
         L     ASMVTPTR,CVTASMVT(,@14)                             0520 01686000
*   EPAPTR=REG1;                    /* PUT EPATH ADDR IN REG4        */ 01687000
         LR    EPAPTR,REG1                                         0521 01688000
*   REG9=EPAOWKA;                   /* LOAD WORK AREA REG FOR TMRLG  */ 01689000
         L     REG9,EPAOWKA(,EPAPTR)                               0522 01690000
*   REG10=ILRCBTM1;                 /* LOAD BASE REG FOR TMRLG       */ 01691000
         L     @14,@CA02100                                        0523 01692000
         L     REG10,ILRCBTM1-ILRCBTM1(,@14)                       0523 01693000
*   REG13=EPATMRSV;                 /* LOAD SAVE AREA ADDR FOT TMRLG */ 01694000
         L     REG13,EPATMRSV(,EPAPTR)                             0524 01695000
*   GOTO ILRCRTM1;                  /* RETRY IN TMRLG                */ 01696000
         L     @14,@CV02101                                        0525 01697000
         BR    @14                                                 0525 01698000
*   DECLARE                         /* GENERAL PURPOSE REGISTERS     */ 01699000
*     GPR00P PTR(31) REG(0),                                       0526 01700000
*     GPR01P PTR(31) REG(1),                                       0526 01701000
*     GPR14P PTR(31) REG(14),                                      0526 01702000
*     GPR15P PTR(31) REG(15);                                      0526 01703000
*   DECLARE                         /* COMMON VARIABLES              */ 01704000
*     I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                       0527 01705000
*     I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                       0527 01706000
*     I031P PTR(31) BASED,                                         0527 01707000
*     I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                       0527 01708000
*     I015P PTR(15) BASED,                                         0527 01709000
*     I008P PTR(8) BASED,                                          0527 01710000
*     I001C CHAR(1) BASED;                                         0527 01711000
*   END ILRTMI01                                                   0528 01712000
*                                                                  0528 01713000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 01714000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (IFGACB  )                                       */ 01715000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRACE  )                                       */ 01716000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRASMVT)                                       */ 01717000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRASPCT)                                       */ 01718000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (CVT     )                                       */ 01719000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILREPATH)                                       */ 01720000
*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRPART )                                       */ 01721000

*/*%INCLUDE SYSLIB  (ILRAFS00)                                       */ 01727000
*                                                                  0528 01728000
*       ;                                                          0528 01729000
