./  ADD  SSI=63140186,NAME=ILRTMRLG
         TITLE 'ILRTMRLG - TASK MODE RELEASE LOGICAL GROUP             *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
ILRTMRLG CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'ILRTMRLG  76.315'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @10,0                                               0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@10                                         0001 00012000
STRTPGM@ EQU   @PSTART                                                  00013000
*   SMSIECB@=MSIECB@;               /* SAVE ADDRESS OF MSI'S ECB     */ 00014000
         L     SMSIECB@,MSIECB@(,R1)                               0050 00015000
         LA    SMSIECB@,0(,SMSIECB@)                               0050 00016000
*   RFY                                                            0051 00017000
*    (R1) UNRSTD;                                                  0051 00018000
         EJECT                                                          00019000
*                                                                  0052 00020000
*/********************************************************************/ 00021000
*/********************************************************************/ 00022000
*/*     ESTABLISH A WORKAREA                                         */ 00023000
*/********************************************************************/ 00024000
*/********************************************************************/ 00025000
*                                                                  0052 00026000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00027000
*   /*                                                               */ 00028000
*   /* OBTAIN STORAGE FROM LSQA (SUBPOOL 255) FOR A WORKAREA VIA     */ 00029000
*   /* GETMAIN. NOTE THAT THE EPATH IS IN THE WORKAREA.              */ 00030000
*   /*                                                               */ 00031000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00032000
*                                                                  0052 00033000
*   RFY                                                            0052 00034000
*    (R1) RSTD;                                                    0052 00035000
*   DO;                             /* GETMAIN (RU) LV(WKARLEN)    0053 00036000
*                                      SP(255)                       */ 00037000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0054 00038000
*      (GPR01F,                                                    0054 00039000
*       GPR15F,                                                    0054 00040000
*       GPR00F) RESTRICTED;                                        0054 00041000
*     GPR01F=0;                     /* REG 1 MUST BE ZERO            */ 00042000
         SLR   GPR01F,GPR01F                                       0055 00043000
*     GPR15F=2;                     /* RU-TYPE GETMAIN               */ 00044000
         LA    GPR15F,2                                            0056 00045000
*     GPR00F=WKARLEN;               /* LENGTH REQUESTED              */ 00046000
         L     GPR00F,WKARLEN                                      0057 00047000
*     GPR15F=GPR15F|((255)*256);    /* SP IN BYTE 2                  */ 00048000
         O     GPR15F,@CF01446                                     0058 00049000
*     SVC(120);                     /* RC/RU-FORM OF GETMAIN         */ 00050000
         SVC   120                                                 0059 00051000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0060 00052000
*      (GPR01F,                                                    0060 00053000
*       GPR15F,                                                    0060 00054000
*       GPR00F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0060 00055000
*   END;                            /* GETMAIN (RU) LV(WKARLEN)    0061 00056000
*                                      SP(255) USE GETMAIN TO OBTAIN    00057000
*                                      THE NEEDED STORAGE            */ 00058000
*   WKARPTR=R1;                     /* OBTAIN POINTER TO ILRTMRLG'S     00059000
*                                      WORKAREA                      */ 00060000
         LR    WKARPTR,R1                                          0062 00061000
*   RFY                                                            0063 00062000
*    (R1) UNRSTD;                                                  0063 00063000
*                                                                  0063 00064000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00065000
*   /*                                                               */ 00066000
*   /* OBTAIN A POINTER TO THE ASM VECTOR TABLE (ASMVT).             */ 00067000
*   /*                                                               */ 00068000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00069000
*                                                                  0064 00070000
*   ASMVTPTR=CVTASMVT;              /* OBTAIN POINTER TO ASMVT       */ 00071000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0064 00072000
         L     ASMVTPTR,CVTASMVT(,@12)                             0064 00073000
         EJECT                                                          00074000
*                                                                  0065 00075000
*/********************************************************************/ 00076000
*/********************************************************************/ 00077000
*/*     ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY AND RECOVERY ENVIRONMENT            */ 00078000
*/********************************************************************/ 00079000
*/********************************************************************/ 00080000
*                                                                  0065 00081000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00082000
*   /*                                                               */ 00083000
*   /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY TO THE WORKAREA FOR ILRTMRLG. SET REG*/ 00084000
*   /* 13 TO POINT TO ILRTMRLG'S SAVE AREA.                          */ 00085000
*   /*                                                               */ 00086000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00087000
*                                                                  0065 00088000
*   GEN;                                                           0065 00089000
         USING @DATD,WKARPTR     /* ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY TO       ''00090000
                                    ILRTMRLG'S WORKAREA   */            00091000
*   R13=ADDR(TMRSA);                /* SET REG 13 TO ADDRESS OF    0066 00092000
*                                      ILRTMRLG'S SAVE AREA          */ 00093000
*                                                                  0066 00094000
         LA    R13,TMRSA                                           0066 00095000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00096000
*   /*                                                               */ 00097000
*   /* OBTAIN A POINTER TO THE EPATH AND THEN CLEAR IT               */ 00098000
*   /*                                                               */ 00099000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00100000
*                                                                  0067 00101000
*   EPAPTR=ADDR(EPATH);             /* OBTAIN POINTER TO EPATH       */ 00102000
         LA    EPAPTR,EPATH                                        0067 00103000
*   EPATH=EPATH&&EPATH;             /* CLEAR EPATH                   */ 00104000
*                                                                  0068 00105000
         XC    EPATH(44),EPATH                                     0068 00106000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00107000
*   /*                                                               */ 00108000
*   /* ESTABLISH RECOVERY ENVIRONMENT VIA AN ESTAE MACRO             */ 00109000
*   /*                                                               */ 00110000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00111000
*                                                                  0069 00112000
*   RFY                                                            0069 00113000
*    (R7) RSTD;                                                    0069 00114000
*   ESTAELST(1:ESTAELEN)=ESTAEFMT(1:ESTAELEN);/* INITIALIZE ESTAE  0070 00115000
*                                      PARAMETER LIST                */ 00116000
         L     @12,ESTAELEN                                        0070 00117000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               0070 00118000
         EX    @12,@SM01449                                        0070 00119000
*   R7=ADDR(ILRTMI01);              /* OBTAIN ENTRY POINT ADDRESS OF    00120000
*                                      ILRTMI01                      */ 00121000
         L     R7,@CV01356                                         0071 00122000
*   GEN REFS(R7,EPAPTR);                                           0072 00123000
         ESTAE (7),PARAM=(EPAPTR),MF=(E,ESTAELST) /* ESTABLISH        ''00124000
                                                          RECOVERY  */  00125000
*   RFY                                                            0073 00126000
*    (R7) UNRSTD;                                                  0073 00127000
*                                                                  0073 00128000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00129000
*   /*                                                               */ 00130000
*   /* RECORD POINTERS INTO EPATH                                    */ 00131000
*   /*                                                               */ 00132000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00133000
*                                                                  0074 00134000
*   EPAOWKA=WKARPTR;                /* RECORD POINTER TO WORKAREA IN    00135000
*                                      EPATH - RRR                   */ 00136000
         ST    WKARPTR,EPAOWKA                                     0074 00137000
*   EPATMRSV=R13;                   /* RECORD ADDRESS OF ILRTMRLG'S     00138000
*                                      SAVE AREA IN EPATH - RRR      */ 00139000
         ST    R13,EPATMRSV                                        0075 00140000
*   EPAMSECB=SMSIECB@;              /* RECORD ADDRESS OF MSI'S ECB IN   00141000
*                                      EPATH - RRR                   */ 00142000
         ST    SMSIECB@,EPAMSECB                                   0076 00143000
         EJECT                                                          00144000
*                                                                  0077 00145000
*/********************************************************************/ 00146000
*/********************************************************************/ 00147000
*/*     COMPLETE ASM INITIALIZATION                                  */ 00148000
*/********************************************************************/ 00149000
*/********************************************************************/ 00150000
*                                                                  0077 00151000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00152000
*   /*                                                               */ 00153000
*   /* CLEAR THE PARAMETER LIST FOR ILRVSAMI AND THEN FILL IN THE    */ 00154000
*   /* CONSTANT FIELDS                                               */ 00155000
*   /*                                                               */ 00156000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00157000
*                                                                  0077 00158000
*   PARMLIST=PARMLIST&&PARMLIST;    /* CLEAR PARAMETER LIST          */ 00159000
         XC    PARMLIST(12),PARMLIST                               0077 00160000
*   PARMOPCD=OPCODE04;              /* SET REQUEST OP-CODE TO 04   0078 00161000
*                                      INDICATING A RETRIEVE AND   0078 00162000
*                                      ERASE FOR RELEASE             */ 00163000
         MVI   PARMOPCD,X'04'                                      0078 00164000
*   PARMEPTH=EPAPTR;                /* STORE POINTER TO EPATH IN   0079 00165000
*                                      PARAMETER LIST                */ 00166000
*                                                                  0079 00167000
         ST    EPAPTR,PARMEPTH                                     0079 00168000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00169000
*   /*                                                               */ 00170000
*   /* SET CERTAIN FIELDS IN THE ASMVT                               */ 00171000
*   /*                                                               */ 00172000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00173000
*                                                                  0080 00174000
*   ASMPACT=ADDR(ILRACT);           /* ENTRY POINT ADDRESS OF ILRACT */ 00175000
         L     @12,@CV01351                                        0080 00176000
         ST    @12,ASMPACT(,ASMVTPTR)                              0080 00177000
*   ASMPRLG=ADDR(ILRRLG);           /* ENTRY POINT ADDRESS OF ILRRLG */ 00178000
         L     @12,@CV01353                                        0081 00179000
         ST    @12,ASMPRLG(,ASMVTPTR)                              0081 00180000
*   ASMPSAV=ADDR(ILRSAV);           /* ENTRY POINT ADDRESS OF ILRSAV */ 00181000
         L     @12,@CV01354                                        0082 00182000
         ST    @12,ASMPSAV(,ASMVTPTR)                              0082 00183000
*   ASMTCBPT=PSATOLD;               /* ADDRESS OF CURRENT TCB        */ 00184000
         L     @12,PSATOLD                                         0083 00185000
         ST    @12,ASMTCBPT(,ASMVTPTR)                             0083 00186000
*   ASMTASCB=PSAAOLD;               /* ADDRESS OF CURRENT ASCB       */ 00187000
*                                                                  0084 00188000
         L     @12,PSAAOLD                                         0084 00189000
         ST    @12,ASMTASCB(,ASMVTPTR)                             0084 00190000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00191000
*   /*                                                               */ 00192000
*   /* LOAD ILRTMI00, CALL ILRTMI00 IN ORDER TO COMPLETE ASM'S       */ 00193000
*   /* INITIALIZATION AND THEN DELETE ILRTMI00                       */ 00194000
*   /*                                                               */ 00195000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00196000
*                                                                  0085 00197000
*   RFY                                                            0085 00198000
*    (R0,                                                          0085 00199000
*     R1) RSTD;                                                    0085 00200000
*   DO;                             /* LOAD EP('ILRTMI00')           */ 00201000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0087 00202000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0087 00203000
*       GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        0087 00204000
*     GPR00P=ADDR('ILRTMI00');      /* LOAD ENTRY POINT NAME ADDRESS */ 00205000
         LA    GPR00P,@CC01364                                     0088 00206000
*     GPR01P=0;                     /* JOBLIB OR LINKLIB DCB         */ 00207000
         SLR   GPR01P,GPR01P                                       0089 00208000
*     SVC(8);                       /* ISSUE LOAD SVC                */ 00209000
         SVC   8                                                   0090 00210000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0091 00211000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    0091 00212000
*       GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0091 00213000
*   END;                            /* LOAD EP('ILRTMI00') LOAD    0092 00214000
*                                      ILRTMI00 INTO STORAGE         */ 00215000
*   RFY                                                            0093 00216000
*    (RETCODE,                                                     0093 00217000
*     TMIRTCD) RSTD;                                               0093 00218000
*   CALL ILRTMI00;                  /* COMPLETE ASM'S INITIALIZATION */ 00219000
         LR    @15,R0                                              0094 00220000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0094 00221000
*ILRCRTM5:                          /* RECOVERY RETRY POINT -- USED     00222000
*                                      SHOULD ILRTMI00 FAIL - RRR    */ 00223000
*   EPATMXIT=ON;                    /* TURN ON THAT FLAG IN THE EPATH   00224000
*                                      THAT INDICATES THAT ILRTMI00     00225000
*                                      HAS COMPLETED - RRR           */ 00226000
ILRCRTM5 OI    EPATMXIT,B'10000000'                                0095 00227000
*   TMIRTCD=RETCODE;                /* SAVE RETURN CODE FROM ILRTMI00*/ 00228000
         LR    TMIRTCD,RETCODE                                     0096 00229000
*   RFY                                                            0097 00230000
*    (R0,                                                          0097 00231000
*     R1,                                                          0097 00232000
*     RETCODE) UNRSTD;                                             0097 00233000
*   DO;                             /* DELETE EP('ILRTMI00')         */ 00234000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0099 00235000
*      (GPR00P) RESTRICTED;                                        0099 00236000
*     GPR00P=ADDR('ILRTMI00');      /* ->ENTRY NAME                  */ 00237000
         LA    GPR00P,@CC01364                                     0100 00238000
*     SVC(9);                       /* DELETE SVC                    */ 00239000
         SVC   9                                                   0101 00240000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0102 00241000
*      (GPR00P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0102 00242000
*   END;                            /* DELETE EP('ILRTMI00') DELETE     00243000
*                                      ILRTMI00 FROM STORAGE         */ 00244000
*                                                                  0103 00245000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00246000
*   /*                                                               */ 00247000
*   /* SIGNAL THE MASTER SCHEDULER INITIALIZATION ROUTINE (MSI) THAT */ 00248000
*   /* INITIALIZTION OF ASM HAS BEEN COMPLETED VIA THE POST MACRO    */ 00249000
*   /*                                                               */ 00250000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00251000
*                                                                  0104 00252000
*   DO;                             /* POST (MSIECB,ZERO)            */ 00253000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0105 00254000
*      (GPR00F,                                                    0105 00255000
*       GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        0105 00256000
*     GPR00F=ZERO;                  /* POST CODE IN R0               */ 00257000
         SLR   GPR00F,GPR00F                                       0106 00258000
*     GPR01P=ADDR(MSIECB);          /* ECB ADDRESS                   */ 00259000
         LR    GPR01P,SMSIECB@                                     0107 00260000
*     SVC(2);                       /* ISSUE POST SVC                */ 00261000
         SVC   2                                                   0108 00262000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0109 00263000
*      (GPR00F,                                                    0109 00264000
*       GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0109 00265000
*   END;                            /* POST (MSIECB,ZERO) POST MSI 0110 00266000
*                                      ROUTINE                       */ 00267000
*   EPAMAST=ON;                     /* SET EPATH FLAG INDICATING   0111 00268000
*                                      M.S.I. HAS BEEN POSTED - RRR  */ 00269000
         OI    EPAMAST,B'00001000'                                 0111 00270000
*   EPAMSECB=ZERO;                  /* ZERO THE EPATH FIELD        0112 00271000
*                                      CONTAINING THE ADDRESS OF   0112 00272000
*                                      MSI'S ECB - RRR               */ 00273000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0112 00274000
         ST    @12,EPAMSECB                                        0112 00275000
*   RFY                                                            0113 00276000
*    (SMSIECB@,                                                    0113 00277000
*     TMIRTCD) UNRSTD;                                             0113 00278000
         EJECT                                                          00279000
*                                                                  0114 00280000
*/********************************************************************/ 00281000
*/********************************************************************/ 00282000
*/*     PROCESS THE REQUEST QUEUE WHEN POSTED BY ILRRLG              */ 00283000
*/********************************************************************/ 00284000
*/********************************************************************/ 00285000
*                                                                  0114 00286000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00287000
*   /*                                                               */ 00288000
*   /* ILRTMRLG ISSUES A WAIT ON ASMTMECB TO WAIT FOR WORK. ILRRLG   */ 00289000
*   /* WILL PLACE AN ACE ON THE REQUEST QUEUE AND THEN POST ASMTMECB.*/ 00290000
*   /* A COMPARE & SWAP IS USED TO MOVE THE REQUEST QUEUE TO THE WORK*/ 00291000
*   /* QUEUE. ILRTMRLG WILL THEN PROCESS ALL THE ACE'S ON THE WORK   */ 00292000
*   /* QUEUE. IF THE REQUEST QUEUE IS NOT EMPTY AFTER ALL THE ACE'S  */ 00293000
*   /* ON THE WORK QUEUE HAVE BEEN PROCESSED, THEN COMPARE & SWAP IS */ 00294000
*   /* USED AGAIN TO MOVE THE REQUEST QUEUE TO THE WORK QUEUE.       */ 00295000
*   /* ILRTMRLG WILL CONTINUE TO PROCESS ALL THE ACE'S ON THE REQUEST*/ 00296000
*   /* QUEUE. ONCE ALL THE INPUT ACE'S HAVE BEEN EXHAUSTED, ILRTMRLG */ 00297000
*   /* WILL ISSUE ANOTHER WAIT ON ASMTMECB.                          */ 00298000
*   /*                                                               */ 00299000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00300000
*                                                                  0114 00301000
*   ASMTMECB=ZERO;                  /* ZERO OUT THE ASMTMECB         */ 00302000
         ST    @12,ASMTMECB(,ASMVTPTR)                             0114 00303000
*   DO UNTIL(ZERO=ONE);             /* DO FOREVER                    */ 00304000
@DL00115 DS    0H                                                  0116 00305000
*     DO;                           /* WAIT ECB(ASMTMECB)            */ 00306000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0117 00307000
*        (GPR00P,                                                  0117 00308000
*         GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                      0117 00309000
*       GPR00P=1;                   /* LOAD WAIT COUNT               */ 00310000
         LA    GPR00P,1                                            0118 00311000
*       GPR01P=ADDR(ASMTMECB);      /* ADDRESS OF ECB                */ 00312000
         LA    GPR01P,ASMTMECB(,ASMVTPTR)                          0119 00313000
*       SVC(1);                     /* WAIT SVC                      */ 00314000
         SVC   1                                                   0120 00315000
*       RESPECIFY                                                  0121 00316000
*        (GPR00P,                                                  0121 00317000
*         GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                    0121 00318000
*     END;                          /* WAIT ECB(ASMTMECB) WAIT FOR 0122 00319000
*                                      WORK TO BE DONE               */ 00320000
*     ASMTMECB=ZERO;                /* ZERO OUT THE ASMTMECB         */ 00321000
*                                                                  0123 00322000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0123 00323000
         ST    @12,ASMTMECB(,ASMVTPTR)                             0123 00324000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00325000
*     /*                                                             */ 00326000
*     /* CONTINUE TO PROCESS ALL THE ACE'S ON THE REQUEST QUEUE UNTIL*/ 00327000
*     /* IT IS EMPTY                                                 */ 00328000
*     /*                                                             */ 00329000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00330000
*                                                                  0124 00331000
*     DO WHILE(ASMRLGRQÂ¬=ZERO);                                    0124 00332000
*                                                                  0124 00333000
         B     @DE00124                                            0124 00334000
@DL00124 DS    0H                                                  0125 00335000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00336000
*       /*                                                           */ 00337000
*       /* COMPARE AND SWAP THE REQUEST QUEUE TO THE WORK QUEUE      */ 00338000
*       /*                                                           */ 00339000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00340000
*                                                                  0125 00341000
*       RFY                                                        0125 00342000
*        (R0,                                                      0125 00343000
*         R1) RSTD;                                                0125 00344000
*       R0=ASMRLGRQ;                /* GET POINTER TO FIRST ACE FROM    00345000
*                                      REQUEST QUEUE HEADER          */ 00346000
         L     R0,ASMRLGRQ(,ASMVTPTR)                              0126 00347000
*TRYAGAIN:                                                         0127 00348000
*       R1=ZERO;                                                   0127 00349000
TRYAGAIN SLR   R1,R1                                               0127 00350000
*       CS(R0,R1,ASMRLGRQ);         /* SET REQUEST QUEUE EMPTY       */ 00351000
         CS    R0,@01,ASMRLGRQ(ASMVTPTR)                           0128 00352000
*       BC(NE,TRYAGAIN);            /* IF UNSUCCESSFUL, TRY AGAIN    */ 00353000
         BC    7,TRYAGAIN                                          0129 00354000
*       ASMRLGWQ=R0;                /* PUT POINTER TO FIRST ACE INTO    00355000
*                                      WORK QUEUE HEADER             */ 00356000
         ST    R0,ASMRLGWQ(,ASMVTPTR)                              0130 00357000
*       RFY                                                        0131 00358000
*        (R0,                                                      0131 00359000
*         R1) UNRSTD;                                              0131 00360000
         EJECT                                                          00361000
*                                                                  0132 00362000
*/********************************************************************/ 00363000
*/********************************************************************/ 00364000
*/*     PROCESS THE WORK QUEUE                                       */ 00365000
*/********************************************************************/ 00366000
*/********************************************************************/ 00367000
*                                                                  0132 00368000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00369000
*       /*                                                           */ 00370000
*       /* PROCESS THE ACE'S ON THE WORK QUEUE                       */ 00371000
*       /*                                                           */ 00372000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00373000
*                                                                  0132 00374000
*ILRCRTM1:                          /* RECOVERY RETRY POINT -- USED     00375000
*                                      SHOULD ILRTMRLG FAIL - RRR    */ 00376000
*       DO WHILE(ASMRLGWQÂ¬=ZERO);                                  0132 00377000
ILRCRTM1 B     @DE00132                                            0132 00378000
@DL00132 DS    0H                                                  0133 00379000
*         RFY                                                      0133 00380000
*          (ACEPTR) RSTD;                                          0133 00381000
*                                                                  0133 00382000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00383000
*         /*                                                         */ 00384000
*         /* REMOVE AN ACE FROM WORK QUEUE HEADER AND RECORD THE     */ 00385000
*         /* POINTER TO THE ACE IN THE EPATH                         */ 00386000
*         /*                                                         */ 00387000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00388000
*                                                                  0134 00389000
*         ACEPTR=ASMRLGWQ;          /* OBTAIN ADDRESS OF FIRST ACE ON   00390000
*                                      WORK QUEUE                    */ 00391000
         L     ACEPTR,ASMRLGWQ(,ASMVTPTR)                          0134 00392000
*         ASMRLGWQ=ACEFQPA;         /* PLACE ADDRESS OF NEXT ACE INTO   00393000
*                                      WORK QUEUE HEADER             */ 00394000
         L     @12,ACEFQPA(,ACEPTR)                                0135 00395000
         ST    @12,ASMRLGWQ(,ASMVTPTR)                             0135 00396000
*         EPAACE=ACEPTR;            /* RECORD ACE POINTER IN EPATH -    00397000
*                                      RRR                           */ 00398000
*                                                                  0136 00399000
         ST    ACEPTR,EPAACE                                       0136 00400000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00401000
*         /*                                                         */ 00402000
*         /* PLACE A POINTER TO THE 'S' SYMBOL THAT IS IN THE ACE    */ 00403000
*         /* INTO THE PARAMETER LIST FOR ILRVSAMI. CALL ILRVSAMI TO  */ 00404000
*         /* RETRIEVE AND ERASE THE INFORMATION SAVED FOR THE LOGICAL*/ 00405000
*         /* GROUP THAT IS REPRESENTED BY THE 'S' SYMBOL.            */ 00406000
*         /*                                                         */ 00407000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00408000
*                                                                  0137 00409000
*         PARMSYM=ADDR(ACESYM);     /* STORE POINTER TO 'S' SYMBOL IN   00410000
*                                      PARAMETER LIST                */ 00411000
         LA    @12,ACESYM(,ACEPTR)                                 0137 00412000
         ST    @12,PARMSYM                                         0137 00413000
*         RFY                                                      0138 00414000
*          (R1,                                                    0138 00415000
*           RTASPCT@,                                              0138 00416000
*           RETCODE) RSTD;                                         0138 00417000
*         R1=ADDR(PARMLIST);        /* PLACE ADDRESS OF PARAMETER  0139 00418000
*                                      LIST INTO REG 1               */ 00419000
         LA    R1,PARMLIST                                         0139 00420000
*         CALL ILRVSAMI;            /* RETRIEVE AND ERASE THE ASPCT     00421000
*                                      AND ITS EXTENSIONS FOR A    0140 00422000
*                                      RELEASE LOGICAL GROUP       0140 00423000
*                                      OPERATION                     */ 00424000
         L     @15,@CV01357                                        0140 00425000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0140 00426000
*         RFY                                                      0141 00427000
*          (R1) UNRSTD;                                            0141 00428000
         EJECT                                                          00429000
*                                                                  0142 00430000
*/********************************************************************/ 00431000
*/********************************************************************/ 00432000
*/*    PROCESS ASPCT AND ITS EXTENSIONS IF RETRIEVED BY ILRVSAMI     */ 00433000
*/********************************************************************/ 00434000
*/********************************************************************/ 00435000
*                                                                  0142 00436000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00437000
*         /*                                                         */ 00438000
*         /* IF AN ASPCT WAS RETRIEVED OR PARTIALLY RETRIEVED FROM   */ 00439000
*         /* SYS1.STGINDEX,THEN (1) FREE THE SLOTS ASSOCIATED WITH   */ 00440000
*         /* THE RETRIEVED ASPCT AND ITS EXTENSIONS AND (2) FREE THE */ 00441000
*         /* BUFFERS CONTAINING THE RETRIEVED ASPCT AND ITS          */ 00442000
*         /* EXTENSIONS. IF AN ASPCT WAS NOT RETRIEVED, JUST SIMPLY  */ 00443000
*         /* RETURN THE ACE TO THE ACE POOL.                         */ 00444000
*         /*                                                         */ 00445000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00446000
*                                                                  0142 00447000
*         RFY                                                      0142 00448000
*          (ASPCTPTR) RSTD;                                        0142 00449000
*         IF RETCODE=RTCD0000|RETCODE=RTCD0048 THEN                0143 00450000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0143 00451000
         BZ    @RT00143                                            0143 00452000
         C     RETCODE,@CF00241                                    0143 00453000
         BNE   @RF00143                                            0143 00454000
@RT00143 DS    0H                                                  0144 00455000
*           DO;                                                    0144 00456000
*                                                                  0144 00457000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00458000
*             /*                                                     */ 00459000
*             /* RELEASE THE SLOTS STILL ASSOCIATED WITH THE LOGICAL */ 00460000
*             /* GROUP THAT IS REPRESENTED BY THE RETRIEVED ASPCT AND*/ 00461000
*             /* ITS EXTENSIONS.                                     */ 00462000
*             /*                                                     */ 00463000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00464000
*                                                                  0145 00465000
*             RFY                                                  0145 00466000
*              (RETCODE) UNRSTD;                                   0145 00467000
*             ASPCTPTR=RTASPCT@;    /* SAVE THE POINTER TO THE     0146 00468000
*                                      RETRIEVED ASPCT               */ 00469000
         LR    ASPCTPTR,RTASPCT@                                   0146 00470000
*             RFY                                                  0147 00471000
*              (RTASPCT@) UNRSTD;                                  0147 00472000
*             RFY                                                  0148 00473000
*              (R0) RSTD;                                          0148 00474000
*             FREESLOT=ZERO;        /* SET FREESLOT COUNTER TO ZERO  */ 00475000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0149 00476000
         ST    @12,FREESLOT                                        0149 00477000
*             R0=ASPCTPTR;          /* LOAD REG 0 WITH A POINTER TO     00478000
*                                      THE RETRIEVED ASPCT           */ 00479000
         LR    R0,ASPCTPTR                                         0150 00480000
*             CALL ILRALS00;        /* CALL ILRALS00 TO RELEASE THE     00481000
*                                      SLOTS STILL ASSOCIATED WITH 0151 00482000
*                                      THE RETRIEVED ASPCT AND ITS 0151 00483000
*                                      EXTENSIONS. UPON RETURN, THE     00484000
*                                      FREESLOT COUNTER WILL CONTAIN    00485000
*                                      THE NUMBER OF SLOTS FREED.    */ 00486000
*                                                                  0151 00487000
         BAL   @14,ILRALS00                                        0151 00488000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00489000
*             /*                                                     */ 00490000
*             /* USE COMPARE AND SWAP LOGIC TO DECREMENT THE ASMVT   */ 00491000
*             /* VIO COUNT FIELD BY THE FREESLOT COUNTER.            */ 00492000
*             /*                                                     */ 00493000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00494000
*                                                                  0152 00495000
*             RFY                                                  0152 00496000
*              (R1) RSTD;                                          0152 00497000
*             R0=ASMVSC;            /* OBTAIN THE ASMVT VIO COUNT    */ 00498000
         L     R0,ASMVSC(,ASMVTPTR)                                0153 00499000
*SETVSC:                                                           0154 00500000
*             R1=R0-FREESLOT;       /* DECREMENT COUNTER BY FREESLOT    00501000
*                                      COUNTER                       */ 00502000
SETVSC   LR    R1,R0                                               0154 00503000
         SL    R1,FREESLOT                                         0154 00504000
*             CS(R0,R1,ASMVSC);     /* UPDATE ASMVT VIO COUNT FIELD  */ 00505000
         CS    R0,@01,ASMVSC(ASMVTPTR)                             0155 00506000
*             BC(NE,SETVSC);        /* IF UNSUCCESSFUL, TRY AGAIN    */ 00507000
*                                                                  0156 00508000
         BC    7,SETVSC                                            0156 00509000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00510000
*             /*                                                     */ 00511000
*             /* IF THE ASPCT THAT WAS RETRIEVED WAS NOT CURRENTLY   */ 00512000
*             /* ACTIVE, INCREMENT THE ASMVT UNRESERVED SLOT COUNTER */ 00513000
*             /* BY THE NUMBER OF SLOTS THAT WERE RESERVED FOR THAT  */ 00514000
*             /* LOGICAL GROUP (I.E., THE LOGICAL GROUP REPRESENTED  */ 00515000
*             /* BY THE RETRIEVED ASPCT AND ITS EXTENSIONS.          */ 00516000
*             /*                                                     */ 00517000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00518000
*                                                                  0157 00519000
*             IF ACENOACT=ON THEN                                  0157 00520000
         TM    ACENOACT(ACEPTR),B'00010000'                        0157 00521000
         BNO   @RF00157                                            0157 00522000
*               DO;                                                0158 00523000
*                 BACKSLOT=ASPMAXPN;/* SET BACKSLOT TO MAXIMUM NUMBER   00524000
*                                      OF SLOTS THAT COULD BE      0159 00525000
*                                      ALLOCATED TO THIS LOGICAL   0159 00526000
*                                      GROUP                         */ 00527000
         L     BACKSLOT,ASPMAXPN(,ASPCTPTR)                        0159 00528000
*                 IF SLOTVÂ¬=ZERO THEN                              0160 00529000
         L     @12,ASMSLOTV(,ASMVTPTR)                             0160 00530000
         L     @12,SLOTV(,@12)                                     0160 00531000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0160 00532000
         BZ    @RF00160                                            0160 00533000
*                   BACKSLOT=BACKSLOT/SLOTV;/* SET BACKSLOT TO THE 0161 00534000
*                                      NUMBER OF SLOTS THAT WERE   0161 00535000
*                                      RESERVED FOR THIS LOGICAL   0161 00536000
*                                      GROUP                         */ 00537000
         LR    @14,BACKSLOT                                        0161 00538000
         SRDA  @14,32                                              0161 00539000
         DR    @14,@12                                             0161 00540000
         LR    BACKSLOT,@15                                        0161 00541000
*                 R0=ASMBKSLT;      /* OBTAIN ASMVT UNRESERVED SLOT     00542000
*                                      COUNTER                       */ 00543000
@RF00160 L     R0,ASMBKSLT(,ASMVTPTR)                              0162 00544000
*SETBKSLT:                                                         0163 00545000
*                 R1=R0+BACKSLOT;   /* INCREMENT COUNTER BY BACKSLOT    00546000
*                                      COUNTER                       */ 00547000
SETBKSLT LR    R1,R0                                               0163 00548000
         ALR   R1,BACKSLOT                                         0163 00549000
*                 CS(R0,R1,ASMBKSLT);/* UPDATE ASMVT UNRESERVED SLOT    00550000
*                                      COUNT FIELD                   */ 00551000
         CS    R0,@01,ASMBKSLT(ASMVTPTR)                           0164 00552000
*                 BC(NE,SETBKSLT);  /* IF UNSUCCESFFUL, TRY AGAIN    */ 00553000
         BC    7,SETBKSLT                                          0165 00554000
*               END;                                               0166 00555000
*             RFY                                                  0167 00556000
*              (R0,                                                0167 00557000
*               R1) UNRSTD;                                        0167 00558000
@RF00157 DS    0H                                                  0168 00559000
         EJECT                                                          00560000
*                                                                  0168 00561000
*/********************************************************************/ 00562000
*/********************************************************************/ 00563000
*/*    FREE BUFFERS CONTAINING RETRIEVED ASPCT AND ITS EXTENSIONS    */ 00564000
*/********************************************************************/ 00565000
*/********************************************************************/ 00566000
*                                                                  0168 00567000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00568000
*             /*                                                     */ 00569000
*             /* OBTAIN THE LOCAL LOCK UNCONDITIONALLY               */ 00570000
*             /*                                                     */ 00571000

*                                                                  0168 00573000

*              (R11,                                               0168 00575000
*               R12,                                               0168 00576000
*               R14) RSTD;                                         0168 00577000
*             GEN REFS(PSALITA) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);             0169 00578000
GETLCL1  SETLOCK OBTAIN,TYPE=LOCAL,MODE=UNCOND,                       XX00579000
               RELATED=(FREEMAIN,ILRTMRLG(RLSLCL1))                     00580000
*             R13=ADDR(TMRSA);      /* RESTORE REG 13 WITH THE     0170 00581000
*                                      ADDRESS OF ILRTMRLG'S SAVE  0170 00582000
*                                      AREA                          */ 00583000
         LA    R13,TMRSA                                           0170 00584000
*             RFY                                                  0171 00585000
*              (R11,                                               0171 00586000
*               R12,                                               0171 00587000
*               R14) UNRSTD;                                       0171 00588000
*                                                                  0171 00589000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00590000
*             /*                                                     */ 00591000
*             /* FREE THE BUFFERS USED TO CONTAIN THE ASPCT, ASST    */ 00592000
*             /* EXTENSIONS, AND LPME EXTENSIONS                     */ 00593000
*             /*                                                     */ 00594000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00595000
*                                                                  0172 00596000
*             RFY                                                  0172 00597000
*              (R0,                                                0172 00598000
*               R1,                                                0172 00599000
*               RETCODE,                                           0172 00600000
*               AFSRTCD) RSTD;                                     0172 00601000

         SLR   @14,@14                                             0173 00604000

*             R0=BUFLEN;            /* LOAD REG 0 WITH BUFFER LENGTH */ 00606000
         LA    R0,2048                                             0174 00607000
*             R1=ASPCTPTR;          /* LOAD REG 1 WITH A POINTER TO     00608000
*                                      THE RETRIEVED ASPCT           */ 00609000
         LR    R1,ASPCTPTR                                         0175 00610000
*             CALL ILRAFS00;        /* FREE THE ASPCT BUFFERS        */ 00611000
         BAL   @14,ILRAFS00                                        0176 00612000
*             AFSRTCD=RETCODE;      /* SAVE THE RETURN CODE          */ 00613000
         LR    AFSRTCD,RETCODE                                     0177 00614000
*             RFY                                                  0178 00615000
*              (R0,                                                0178 00616000
*               R1,                                                0178 00617000
*               ASPCTPTR,                                          0178 00618000
*               RETCODE) UNRSTD;                                   0178 00619000
*                                                                  0178 00620000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00621000
*             /*                                                     */ 00622000
*             /* RELEASE THE LOCAL LOCK                              */ 00623000
*             /*                                                     */ 00624000
*             /*******************************************************/ 00625000
*                                                                  0179 00626000
*             RFY                                                  0179 00627000
*              (R11,                                               0179 00628000
*               R12,                                               0179 00629000
*               R14) RSTD;                                         0179 00630000
*             GEN REFS(PSALITA) SETS(R11,R12,R13,R14);             0180 00631000
RLSLCL1  SETLOCK RELEASE,TYPE=LOCAL,                                  XX00632000

*/********************************************************************/ 00687000
*/********************************************************************/ 00688000
*/*   RETURN ACE TO ACE POOL EVEN IF ASPCT HAS NOT BEEN RETRIEVED    */ 00689000

*                                                                  0193 00692000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00693000
*         /*                                                         */ 00694000

*                                                                  0196 00714000
*         DO;                       /* ILRGMA FREE                 0196 00715000

*           DECLARE                 /* ASMVT VECTOR TO ILRPEX        */ 00717000

*           DECLARE                 /* MAP FOR CELL CONTROL WORDS    */ 00719000
*             1 GMACELL BASED BDY(WORD),                           0198 00720000

*           RESPECIFY                                              0199 00722000
*            (R0,                                                  0199 00723000
*             R1,                                                  0199 00724000
*             R11,                                                 0199 00725000

*             R14,                                                 0199 00727000

*           RESPECIFY                                              0200 00729000

*           LM(R14,R15,ASMCPRSQ);   /* GET CONTENTS OF Q             */ 00735000

*GMA00111:                                                         0204 00737000

*             DO;                   /* REPLENISH ACE RESERVE Q       */ 00741000
*               R0=R14-1;           /* SET UP FOR COMPARE AND SWAP   */ 00742000

*               GMANEXT=R15;        /* CELL TO FREE IN R1            */ 00745000

*               CS(R14,R1,ASMCPAVL);/* ADD INPUT CELL TO POOL        */ 00762000

*             END;                  /* ACE RETURNED TO NORMAL Q      */ 00766000
*           RESPECIFY                                              0217 00767000

*             R1,                                                  0217 00769000

*         END;                      /* ILRGMA FREE                 0218 00775000

*         /*                                                         */ 00779000

*         /*                                                         */ 00781000

*         EPARECUR=OFF;             /* TURN OFF THE RECURSION FLAG IN   00787000
*                                      THE EPATH - RRR               */ 00788000

*                                                                  0221 00790000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00791000
*         /*                                                         */ 00792000
*         /* IF THERE ARE MORE ACE'S ON THE WORK QUEUE, THEN CONTINUE*/ 00793000
*         /* PROCESSING THE WORK QUEUE. OTHERWISE, CHECK THE REQUEST */ 00794000
*         /* QUEUE FOR MORE ACE'S. IF THE REQUEST QUEUE IS EMPTY,    */ 00795000
*         /* THEN GO BACK AND WAIT FOR MORE WORK                     */ 00796000
