*         /***********************************************************/ 00798000
*                                                                  0221 00799000
*       END;                        /* WORK QUEUE IS EMPTY (ASMRLGWQ    00800000
*                                      = ZERO) ?                     */ 00801000
@DE00132 SLR   @12,@12                                             0221 00802000
         C     @12,ASMRLGWQ(,ASMVTPTR)                             0221 00803000
         BNE   @DL00132                                            0221 00804000
*       ASMTMECB=ZERO;              /* ZERO OUT THE ASMTMECB         */ 00805000
         ST    @12,ASMTMECB(,ASMVTPTR)                             0222 00806000
*     END;                          /* REQUEST QUEUE IS EMPTY      0223 00807000
*                                      (ASMRLGRQ = ZERO) ?           */ 00808000
@DE00124 L     @12,ASMRLGRQ(,ASMVTPTR)                             0223 00809000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0223 00810000
         BNZ   @DL00124                                            0223 00811000
*     EPARECUR=OFF;                 /* TURN OFF THE RECURSION FLAG IN   00812000
*                                      THE EPATH - RRR               */ 00813000
         NI    EPARECUR,B'11111101'                                0224 00814000
*   END;                            /* DO FOREVER                    */ 00815000
@DE00115 B     @DL00115                                            0225 00816000
         SPACE 3                                                        00817000
*   RFY                                                            0226 00818000
*    (ACEPTR,                                                      0226 00819000
*     ASPCTPTR) RSTD;                                              0226 00820000
         EJECT                                                          00821000
*                                                                  0227 00822000
*/*  MACCOMP Y-4SC1CW/PZD81                                          */ 00823000
*/*  MACSTAT Y-475082/415304                                         */ 00824000
*/********************************************************************/ 00825000
*/*                                                                  */ 00826000
*/*  NAME:  ILRALS00                                                 */ 00827000
*/*                                                                  */ 00828000
*/*  STATUS:  OS/VS2 RELEASE 4, LEVEL 0                              */ 00829000
*/*                                                                  */ 00830000
*/*  ENTRY POINT:  ILRALS00                                          */ 00831000
*/*                                                                  */ 00832000
*/*  FUNCTION:  THIS SUBROUTINE SEARCHES THE LPME SECTORS OF A GIVEN */ 00833000
*/*             ASPCT AND CALLS A PROCESSING ROUTINE (ALSPROC) FOR   */ 00834000
*/*             EVERY VALID LSID IT FINDS.                           */ 00835000
*/*                                                                  */ 00836000
*/*  INPUT:  ADDRESS OF ASPCT IN REGISTER 0.                         */ 00837000
*/*                                                                  */ 00838000
*/*  PROCESS:  FOR EACH LPME EXTENSION, FIND ALL LPMES CONTAINING    */ 00839000
*/*            VALID LSIDS AND SEND THEIR ADDRESSES, ONE AT A TIME   */ 00840000
*/*            (ALONG WITH THE INPUT CONTROL INFORMATION), TO ALSPROC*/ 00841000
*/*              ALSPROC INPUT -                                     */ 00842000
*/*                REGISTER 0 = RPN OF LPME PASSED                   */ 00843000
*/*                REGISTER 1 = ADDRESS OF LPME                      */ 00844000
*/*                                                                  */ 00845000
*/*  OUTPUT:  NONE                                                   */ 00846000
*/*                                                                  */ 00847000
*/*  EXIT-NORMAL:  RETURN TO CALLER                                  */ 00848000
*/*                                                                  */ 00849000
*/*  EXIT-ERROR:  NONE                                               */ 00850000
*/*                                                                  */ 00851000
*/*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES:  NONE                                      */ 00852000
*/*                                                                  */ 00853000
*/*  REGISTERS CLOBBERED:  0 AND 1, 14 AND 15                        */ 00854000
*/*                                                                  */ 00855000
*/*  MAPPING MACROS USED:  ILRASPCT                                  */ 00856000
*/*                                                                  */ 00857000
*/*   NOTES:  DUE TO PLS OPTIMIZATION, RESTRICT ALL NECESSARY        */ 00858000
*/*          REGISTERS AROUND THIS ROUTINE.                          */ 00859000
*/*          ALL LABELS AND DATA AREAS CREATED BY THIS ROUTINE BEGIN */ 00860000
*/*          WITH THE THREE CHARACTERS 'ALS'.  THE CALLING MODULE    */ 00861000
*/*          MUST INCLUDE SUFFICIENT WORKSPACE FOR THIS ROUTINE'S    */ 00862000
*/*          DATA AREAS.  THIS AMOUNT IS COMPILER DEPENDENT WITH A   */ 00863000
*/*          MAXIMUM REQUIREMENT OF 44 BYTES.  THIS ROUTINE ALSO     */ 00864000
*/*          REQUIRES THAT THE CALLING MODULE DECLARES REGISTERS     */ 00865000
*/*          R0-R15.                                                 */ 00866000
*/*          MAPPING MACROS LISTED ABOVE MUST BE INCLUDED IN THE     */ 00867000
*/*          CALLING MODULE.  THE PROCEDURE ALSPROC MUST BE DEFINED  */ 00868000
*/*          BY THE CALLING MODULE.  THE PL/S MACRO FACILITY CAN BE  */ 00869000
*/*          USED TO CHANGE THIS NAME, IF DESIRED.                   */ 00870000
*/*                                                                  */ 00871000
*/*  CHANGE-ACTIVITY:  LINE 052480 DELETED FOR APAR OZ15336          */ 00872000
*/*                                                                  */ 00873000
*/********************************************************************/ 00874000
*/*ILRALS00: CHART (AREF)                                            */ 00875000
*/*HEADER                                                          0227 00876000
*/*           ILRALS00 - FIND ALL VALID LSIDS (& RPNS) IN AN ASPCT   */ 00877000
*/*ILRALS00: E ENTRY                                                 */ 00878000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 00879000
*/*         P  SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE                                */ 00880000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE                */ 00881000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO TWO            */ 00882000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE LPME EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE            */ 00883000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE RPN VALUE TO ZERO                          */ 00884000
*/*         P  GET THE NUMBER OF LPME EXTS FROM BASE                 */ 00885000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO BASE LPME EXTENSION                        */ 00886000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO FIRST LPME                                 */ 00887000
*/*%ALS01:  D  (YES,%ALS02,NO,) LPME VALID?                          */ 00888000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%ALS03) RELEASED AFTER SAVE?                 */ 00889000
*/*%ALS02:  P  LOAD REG 0 WITH RPN                                   */ 00890000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH PTR TO LPME                           */ 00891000
*/*         S  ALSPROC: CALL USER'S ROUTINE                          */ 00892000
*/*%ALS03:  P  INCREMENT THE RPN                                     */ 00893000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE LPME EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                */ 00894000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO NEXT LPME                                  */ 00895000
*/*         D  (YES,%ALS04,NO,) REACHED END OF ARRAY?                */ 00896000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%ALS01) LPME ZERO?                           */ 00897000
*/*%ALS04:  P  RESET LPME EXT SUBSCRIPT TO ONE                       */ 00898000
*/*         D  (YES,%ALS05,NO,) ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?            */ 00899000
*/*         R  RETURN TO CALLER                                      */ 00900000
*/*%ALS05:  D  (YES,,NO,%ALS07) REACHED END OF ASST EXT ARRAY?       */ 00901000
*/*         P  RESET ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                        */ 00902000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                    */ 00903000
*/*         D  (YES,%ALS06,NO,) REACHED END OF BASE ARRAY            */ 00904000
*/*         D  (YES,%ALS07,NO,) ANYMORE ASST EXTS?                   */ 00905000
*/*%ALS06:  R  RETURN TO CALLER                                      */ 00906000
*/*%ALS07:  P  GET PTR TO NEXT ASST EXTENSION                        */ 00907000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO NEXT LPME EXTENSION                        */ 00908000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO FIRST LPME IN EXTENSION                    */ 00909000
*/*         P  (,%ALS01) INCREMENT ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 00910000
*                                                                  0227 00911000
*ILRALS00:                          /* LPME SEARCH                   */ 00912000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0227 00913000
*                                                                  0227 00914000
ILRALS00 DS    0H                                                  0228 00915000
*/*A-000000-999999                                           @Z40WPWH*/ 00916000
*                                                                  0228 00917000
*   DCL                                                            0228 00918000
*     ALSRETRN FIXED(31),           /* RETURN ADDRESS SAVE AREA      */ 00919000
*     ALSASPCT PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASPCT BASE             */ 00920000
*     ALSEXPTR PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASST EXTENSION         */ 00921000
*     ALSLEPTR PTR(31),             /* PTR TO LPME EXTENSION         */ 00922000
*     ALSLPME PTR(31),              /* PTR TO INDIVIDUAL LPME        */ 00923000
*     ALSRPN FIXED(31),             /* RELATIVE PAGE NUMBER          */ 00924000
*     ALSA FIXED(31),               /* ASST ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 00925000
*     ALSL FIXED(31),               /* LPME ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 00926000
*     ALSB FIXED(31),               /* BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 00927000
*     ALSCNTL FIXED(8);             /* LOOP CONTROLLER               */ 00928000
*   DCL                                                            0229 00929000
*     ALSZERO FIXED(31) CONSTANT(0),                               0229 00930000
*     ALSONE FIXED(31) CONSTANT(1),                                0229 00931000
*     ALSTWO FIXED(31) CONSTANT(2),                                0229 00932000
*     ALSFIVE FIXED(31) CONSTANT(5),                               0229 00933000
*     ALS257 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(257),                              0229 00934000
*     ALSLPMEL FIXED(31) INIT(LENGTH(ASPLPME)),                    0229 00935000
*     ALSON BIT(1) CONSTANT('1'B);                                 0229 00936000
*   RFY                                                            0230 00937000
*    (R0,                                                          0230 00938000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0230 00939000
*   ALSRETRN=R14;                   /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 00940000
         ST    R14,ALSRETRN                                        0231 00941000
*   ALSASPCT=R0;                    /* SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE        */ 00942000
         ST    R0,ALSASPCT                                         0232 00943000
*   RFY                                                            0233 00944000
*    (R0,                                                          0233 00945000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0233 00946000
*   ALSB=ALSONE;                    /* INIT BASE SUBSCRIPT TO FIRST     00947000
*                                      ASST EXTENSION                */ 00948000
         LA    @08,1                                               0234 00949000
         ST    @08,ALSB                                            0234 00950000
*   ALSA=ALSTWO;                    /* INIT ASST SUBSCRIPT TO FIRST     00951000
*                                      LPME EXTENSION                */ 00952000
         MVC   ALSA(4),@CF00108                                    0235 00953000
*   ALSL=ALSONE;                    /* INIT LPME SUBSCRIPT TO FIRST     00954000
*                                      LPME                          */ 00955000
         LR    ALSL,@08                                            0236 00956000
*   ALSRPN=ALSZERO;                 /* INIT THE RPN                  */ 00957000
         SLR   @02,@02                                             0237 00958000
         ST    @02,ALSRPN                                          0237 00959000
*   ALSCNTL=ALSONE;                 /* INIT LOOP CONTROLLER GET PTR     00960000
*                                      TO LPME'S IN BASE             */ 00961000
         LR    ALSCNTL,@08                                         0238 00962000
*   ALSLPME=ADDR(ALSASPCT->ASPLPMES(ALSL));                        0239 00963000
         L     @08,ALSASPCT                                        0239 00964000
         LR    @02,ALSL                                            0239 00965000
         SLA   @02,2                                               0239 00966000
         LA    ALSLPME,ASPLPMES-4(@02,@08)                         0239 00967000
*   DO WHILE ALSCNTLÂ¬=ALSZERO;                                     0240 00968000
         B     @DE00240                                            0240 00969000
@DL00240 DS    0H                                                  0241 00970000
*     DO WHILE ALSL<ALS257;         /* IS THE LPME VALID OR HAS IT 0241 00971000
*                                      BEEN RELEASED AFTER SAVE?     */ 00972000
         B     @DE00241                                            0241 00973000
@DL00241 DS    0H                                                  0242 00974000
*       IF ALSLPME->ASPLVALD=ALSON|ALSLPME->ASPLSVRP=ALSON THEN    0242 00975000
         TM    ASPLVALD(ALSLPME),B'10001000'                       0242 00976000
         BZ    @RF00242                                            0242 00977000
*         DO;                       /* YES                           */ 00978000
*           RFY                                                    0244 00979000
*            (R0,                                                  0244 00980000
*             R1) RSTD;                                            0244 00981000
*           R0=ALSRPN;              /* LOAD REG0 WITH CURRENT RPN    */ 00982000
         L     R0,ALSRPN                                           0245 00983000
*           R1=ALSLPME;             /* LOAD REG1 WITH PTR TO LPME    */ 00984000
         LR    R1,ALSLPME                                          0246 00985000
*           CALL ALSPROC;           /* CALL USER'S PROC TO PERFORM   */ 00986000
         LA    @15,TMRLPME                                         0247 00987000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0247 00988000
*           RFY                                                    0248 00989000
*            (R0,                                                  0248 00990000
*             R1) UNRSTD;           /* USER'S FUNCTION               */ 00991000
*         END;                                                     0249 00992000
*       ELSE                                                       0250 00993000
*         ;                                                        0250 00994000
@RF00242 DS    0H                                                  0251 00995000
*       ALSRPN=ALSRPN+ALSONE;       /* INCREMENT RPN FOR NEXT LPME   */ 00996000
         LA    @08,1                                               0251 00997000
         L     @02,ALSRPN                                          0251 00998000
         ALR   @02,@08                                             0251 00999000
         ST    @02,ALSRPN                                          0251 01000000
*       ALSLPME=ALSLPME+ALSLPMEL;   /* INCREMENT LPME PTR TO NEXT  0252 01001000
*                                      LPME                          */ 01002000
         AL    ALSLPME,ALSLPMEL                                    0252 01003000
*       ALSL=ALSL+ALSONE;           /* INCREMENT LPME SUBSCRIPT      */ 01004000
         ALR   ALSL,@08                                            0253 01005000
*     END;                          /* ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?     */ 01006000
@DE00241 C     ALSL,@CF01408                                       0254 01007000
         BL    @DL00241                                            0254 01008000
*     IF ALSASPCT->ASPAEXCT=ALSZERO THEN/* NO                        */ 01009000
         L     @08,ALSASPCT                                        0255 01010000
         LH    @08,ASPAEXCT(,@08)                                  0255 01011000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             0255 01012000
         BNZ   @RF00255                                            0255 01013000
*       ALSCNTL=ALSZERO;            /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01014000
         SLR   ALSCNTL,ALSCNTL                                     0256 01015000
*     ELSE                                                         0257 01016000
*       DO;                         /* YES, PROCESS ALL LPME'S IN  0257 01017000
*                                      EXTENSIONS                    */ 01018000
         B     @RC00255                                            0257 01019000
@RF00255 DS    0H                                                  0258 01020000
*         ALSL=ALSONE;              /* RESET LPME SUBSCRIPT          */ 01021000
         LA    ALSL,1                                              0258 01022000
*         IF ALSA<ALS257            /* REACHED END OF ASST ARRAY     */ 01023000
*           THEN                                                   0259 01024000
         L     @08,ALSA                                            0259 01025000
         C     @08,@CF01408                                        0259 01026000
         BNL   @RF00259                                            0259 01027000
*           DO;                     /* NO ANYMORE ASST EXTS?         */ 01028000
*             IF ALSASPCT->ASPASSTP(ALSB)=ALSZERO THEN/* NO          */ 01029000
         L     @08,ALSB                                            0261 01030000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0261 01031000
         L     @02,ALSASPCT                                        0261 01032000
         L     @08,ASPASSTP-4(@08,@02)                             0261 01033000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             0261 01034000
         BNZ   @RF00261                                            0261 01035000
*               ALSCNTL=ALSZERO;    /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01036000
         SLR   ALSCNTL,ALSCNTL                                     0262 01037000
*             ELSE                                                 0263 01038000
*               DO;                 /* YES GET PTR TO NEXT ASST EXT  */ 01039000
         B     @RC00261                                            0263 01040000
@RF00261 DS    0H                                                  0264 01041000
*ALSLOOP:                                                          0264 01042000
*                 ALSEXPTR=ALSASPCT->ASPASSTP(ALSB);               0264 01043000
*                                                                  0264 01044000
ALSLOOP  L     @08,ALSB                                            0264 01045000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0264 01046000
         L     @01,ALSASPCT                                        0264 01047000
         L     ALSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@08,@01)                        0264 01048000
*                 /***************************************************/ 01049000
*                 /*                                                 */ 01050000
*                 /* IF THERE ARE ANYMORE LPME EXTENSIONS, GET THE   */ 01051000
*                 /* POINTER TO THE LPME EXTENSION, POINTER TO THE   */ 01052000
*                 /* LPME, AND INCREMENT THE ASST ARRAY SUBSCRIPT    */ 01053000
*                 /*                                                 */ 01054000
*                 /***************************************************/ 01055000
*                                                                  0265 01056000
*                 IF ALSEXPTR->ASPSECTA(ALSA)Â¬=ALSZERO THEN        0265 01057000
         L     @08,ALSA                                            0265 01058000
         LR    @15,@08                                             0265 01059000
         SLA   @15,2                                               0265 01060000
         L     @15,ASPSECTA-4(@15,ALSEXPTR)                        0265 01061000
         LTR   @15,@15                                             0265 01062000
         BZ    @RF00265                                            0265 01063000
*                   DO;                                            0266 01064000
*                     ALSLEPTR=ALSEXPTR->ASPSECTA(ALSA);           0267 01065000
         LR    ALSLEPTR,@15                                        0267 01066000
*                     ALSLPME=ADDR(ALSLEPTR->ASPLPMEE(ALSL));      0268 01067000
         LR    @02,ALSL                                            0268 01068000
         SLA   @02,2                                               0268 01069000
         LA    ALSLPME,ASPLPMEE-4(@02,ALSLEPTR)                    0268 01070000
*                     ALSA=ALSA+ALSONE;                            0269 01071000
         L     @08,ALSA                                            0269 01072000
         AL    @08,@CF00055                                        0269 01073000
         ST    @08,ALSA                                            0269 01074000
*                   END;                                           0270 01075000
*                 ELSE                                             0271 01076000
*                   ALSCNTL=ALSZERO;                               0271 01077000
         B     @RC00265                                            0271 01078000
@RF00265 SLR   ALSCNTL,ALSCNTL                                     0271 01079000
*               END;                                               0272 01080000
*           END;                                                   0273 01081000
*         ELSE                                                     0274 01082000
*           DO;                                                    0274 01083000
         B     @RC00259                                            0274 01084000
@RF00259 DS    0H                                                  0275 01085000
*             ALSA=ALSONE;          /* RESET ASST SUBSCRIPT          */ 01086000
         LA    @08,1                                               0275 01087000
         ST    @08,ALSA                                            0275 01088000
*             ALSB=ALSB+ALSONE;     /* INCREMENT BASE SUBSCRIPT ARE     01089000
*                                      THERE ANYMORE ASST EXT        */ 01090000
         AL    @08,ALSB                                            0276 01091000
         ST    @08,ALSB                                            0276 01092000
*             IF ALSB<ALSFIVE&ALSASPCT->ASPASSTP(ALSB)Â¬=ALSZERO THEN    01093000
         C     @08,@CF01025                                        0277 01094000
         BNL   @RF00277                                            0277 01095000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0277 01096000
         L     @02,ALSASPCT                                        0277 01097000
         L     @08,ASPASSTP-4(@08,@02)                             0277 01098000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             0277 01099000
         BNZ   @RT00277                                            0277 01100000
*                                   /* YES                           */ 01101000
*               GOTO ALSLOOP;       /* CONTINUE LOOPING              */ 01102000
*             ELSE                  /* NO                            */ 01103000
*               ALSCNTL=ALSZERO;    /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01104000
@RF00277 SLR   ALSCNTL,ALSCNTL                                     0279 01105000
*           END;                                                   0280 01106000
*       END;                                                       0281 01107000
@RC00259 DS    0H                                                  0282 01108000
*   END;                                                           0282 01109000
@RC00255 DS    0H                                                  0282 01110000
@DE00240 C     ALSCNTL,@CF00088                                    0282 01111000
         BNE   @DL00240                                            0282 01112000
*   RFY                                                            0283 01113000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0283 01114000
*   R14=ALSRETRN;                                                  0284 01115000
         L     R14,ALSRETRN                                        0284 01116000
*   RFY                                                            0285 01117000
*     R14 UNRSTD;                                                  0285 01118000
*   END ILRALS00;                                                  0286 01119000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0286 01120000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0286 01121000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0286 01122000
         EJECT                                                          01123000
*                                                                  0287 01124000
*/*  MACCOMP Y-4SC1CW/PZD81                                          */ 01125000
*/*  MACSTAT Y-475082/415304                                         */ 01126000
*/********************************************************************/ 01127000
*/*                                                                  */ 01128000
*/*  NAME:  ILRAFS00                                                 */ 01129000
*/*                                                                  */ 01130000
*/*  STATUS:  OS/VS2 RELEASE 4.1, LEVEL 0                            */ 01131000
*/*                                                                  */ 01132000
*/*  ENTRY POINT:  ILRAFS00                                          */ 01133000
*/*                                                                  */ 01134000
*/*  FUNCTION:  THIS SUBROUTINE FREES AN ASPCT.                      */ 01135000
*/*                                                                  */ 01136000
*/*  INPUT:  ADDRESS OF ASPCT IN REGISTER 1.                         */ 01137000
*/*          LENGTH OF ASPCT IN REGISTER 0.                          */ 01138000
*/*                                                                  */ 01139000
*/*  PROCESS:  TWO LOOPS, ONE TO FREE ASST EXTENSIONS AND ONE TO     */ 01140000
*/*            FREE LPME EXTENSIONS, ARE EXECUTED.  EACH USES THE    */ 01141000
*/*            SUBROUTINE AFSFREE TO INVOKE FREEMAIN.  A FINAL CALL  */ 01142000
*/*            TO AFSFREE FREES THE BASE ASPCT EXTN.                 */ 01143000
*/*                                                                  */ 01144000
*/*  OUTPUT:  RETURN CODE IN REGISTER 15.                            */ 01145000
*/*             00 = NORMAL RETURN                                   */ 01146000
*/*             44 = FREEMAIN FAILURE                                */ 01147000
*/*                                                                  */ 01148000
*/*  EXIT-NORMAL:  RETURN TO CALLER WITH RETURN CODE (SEE OUTPUT)    */ 01149000
*/*                                                                  */ 01150000
*/*  EXIT-ERROR:  NONE                                               */ 01151000
*/*                                                                  */ 01152000
*/*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES:  FREEMAIN                                  */ 01153000
*/*                                                                  */ 01154000
*/*  REGISTERS CLOBBERED:  0 AND 1, 14 AND 15                        */ 01155000
*/*                                                                  */ 01156000
*/*  MAPPING MACROS USED:  ILRASPCT                                  */ 01157000
*/*                                                                  */ 01158000
*/*  NOTES:  DUE TO PLS OPTIMIZATION, RESTRICT ALL NECESSARY         */ 01159000
*/*          REGISTERS AROUND THIS ROUTINE.                          */ 01160000
*/*          INVOKING ROUTINE MUST HOLD THE LOCAL LOCK, OR HAVE      */ 01161000
*/*          SPECIFIED %AFSSVC=YES.                                  */ 01162000
*/*          ALL LABELS AND DATA AREAS CREATED BY THIS ROUTINE BEGIN */ 01163000
*/*          WITH THE THREE CHARACTERS 'AFS'.  THE CALLING MODULE    */ 01164000
*/*          MUST INCLUDE SUFFICIENT WORKSPACE FOR THIS ROUTINE'S    */ 01165000
*/*          DATA AREAS.  THIS AMOUNT IS COMPILER DEPENDENT WITH A   */ 01166000
*/*          MAXIMUM REQUIREMENT OF 46 BYTES.  THIS ROUTINE ALSO     */ 01167000
*/*          REQUIRES THAT THE CALLING MODULE DECLARES REGISTERS     */ 01168000
*/*          R0-R15.  THE MAPPING MACRO LISTED ABOVE MUST BE         */ 01169000
*/*          INCLUDED.  THE BASE POINTER FOR THE ASPCT IS NOT        */ 01170000
*/*          REQUIRED BY THIS SUBROUTINE.                            */ 01171000
*/*                                                                  */ 01172000
*/*  METHOD OF ACCESS:                                               */ 01173000
*/*          %AFSSVC='YES' IF THE INVOKING ROUTINE MUST USE AN SVC   */ 01174000
*/*          %AFSSVC='NO' IF BRANCH ENTRY REQUIRED                   */ 01175000
*/*          %INCLUDE SYSLIB(ILRAFS00)                               */ 01176000
*/********************************************************************/ 01177000
*/*ILRAFS00: CHART (AREF)                                            */ 01178000
*/*HEADER                                                          0287 01179000
*/*            ILRAFS00 - FREE ASPCT STORAGE                         */ 01180000
*/*ILRAFS00: E ENTRY                                                 */ 01181000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 01182000
*/*         P  SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE                                */ 01183000
*/*         P  SAVE THE LENGTH OF ASPCT                              */ 01184000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS01A) SPECIFIED LENGTH THAT OF ASPCT?     */ 01185000
*/*         P  (,%AFS01B) SET SUBPOOL ID TO 255                      */ 01186000
*/*%AFS01A: P  SET SUBPOOL ID TO 230                                 */ 01187000
*/*%AFS01B: D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?            */ 01188000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE                */ 01189000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO TWO            */ 01190000
*/*%AFS01:  P  GET PTR TO ASST EXTENSION                             */ 01191000
*/*%AFS02:  P  GET PTR TO LPME EXTENSION                             */ 01192000
*/*%AFS02A: S  AFSFREE: FREE AN LPME EXTENSION                       */ 01193000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS03,NO,) RETURN CODE ZERO?                    */ 01194000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                */ 01195000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS04,NO,) REACHED END OF ASST EXT ARRAY?       */ 01196000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS04) ANYMORE LPME EXTENSIONS?             */ 01197000
*/*         P  SET PTR TO LPME EXTENSION                             */ 01198000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS02A,NO,%AFS04) IS THIS AN LPME EXTENSION?    */ 01199000
*/*%AFS03:  P  INCREMENT THE ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                */ 01200000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS04,NO,) REACHED END OF ASST EXT ARRAY?       */ 01201000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS02,NO,) ANYMORE LPME EXTENSIONS?             */ 01202000
*/*%AFS04:  P  SET WORK PTR TO ASST EXT                              */ 01203000
*/*         S  AFSFREE: FREE AN ASST EXTENSION                       */ 01204000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS05,NO,) RETURN CODE ZERO?                    */ 01205000
*/*         P  INCREMENT THE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                    */ 01206000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS06,NO,) REACHED END OF BASE ARRAY?           */ 01207000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ANYMORE ASST EXTENSIONS?             */ 01208000
*/*         P  GET PTR TO ASST EXTENSION                             */ 01209000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) IS THIS AN ASST EXTENSION            */ 01210000
*/*         P  (,%AFS02) RESET ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE       */ 01211000
*/*%AFS05:  P  INCREMENT THE BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT                    */ 01212000
*/*         D  (YES,%AFS06,NO,) REACHED END OF BASE ARRAY            */ 01213000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS06) ANYMORE ASST EXTENSIONS?             */ 01214000
*/*         P  (,%AFS01) RESET ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT TO ONE       */ 01215000
*/*%AFS06:  P  SET THE WORK PTR TO ASPCT BASE                        */ 01216000
*/*         S  AFSFREE: FREE THE ASPCT BASE                          */ 01217000
*/*         R  RETURN TO CALLER                                      */ 01218000
*                                                                  0287 01219000
         EJECT                                                          01220000
*ILRAFS00:                                                         0287 01221000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0287 01222000
*                                                                  0287 01223000
ILRAFS00 DS    0H                                                  0288 01224000
*/*A-000000-999999                                           @Z40WPWH*/ 01225000
*                                                                  0288 01226000
*   DECLARE                                                        0288 01227000
*     AFSASPCT PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASPCT BASE             */ 01228000
*     AFSEXPTR PTR(31),             /* PTR TO ASPCT EXTENSIONS       */ 01229000
*     AFSLNGTH FIXED(31),           /* FREEMAIN LENGTH               */ 01230000
*     AFSWORK PTR(31),              /* FREEMAIN ADDRESS              */ 01231000
*     AFSRET1 FIXED(31),            /* INTERNAL RETURN CODE          */ 01232000
*     AFSRET2 FIXED(31),            /* INTERNAL RETURN CODE          */ 01233000
*     AFSA FIXED(31),               /* ASST EXT ARRAY SUBSCRIPT      */ 01234000
*     AFSSPID FIXED(31),            /* SUBPOOL ID FOR FREEMAIN       */ 01235000
*     AFSB FIXED(15),               /* BASE ARRAY SUBSCRIPT          */ 01236000
*     AFSZERO FIXED(31) CONSTANT(0),                               0288 01237000
*     AFSSP230 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(230),                            0288 01238000
*     AFSSP255 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(255),                            0288 01239000
*     AFS257 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(257),                              0288 01240000
*     AFSONE FIXED(15) CONSTANT(1),                                0288 01241000
*     AFS44 FIXED(31) CONSTANT(44),                                0288 01242000
*     AFSTWO FIXED(15) CONSTANT(2),                                0288 01243000
*     AFSFIVE FIXED(15) CONSTANT(5),                               0288 01244000
*     AFSREG3 FIXED(31),            /* REGISTER 3 SAVEAREA           */ 01245000
*     AFSREG4 FIXED(31),            /* REGISTER 4 SAVEAREA           */ 01246000
*     AFSREG7 FIXED(31);            /* REGISTER 7 SAVEAREA           */ 01247000
*   RFY                                                            0289 01248000
*    (R0,                                                          0289 01249000
*     R1,                                                          0289 01250000
*     R3,                                                          0289 01251000
*     R4,                                                          0289 01252000
*     R7,                                                          0289 01253000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0289 01254000
*   AFSRET1=R14;                    /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01255000
         ST    R14,AFSRET1                                         0290 01256000
*   AFSASPCT=R1;                    /* SAVE PTR TO ASPCT BASE        */ 01257000
         ST    R1,AFSASPCT                                         0291 01258000
*   AFSLNGTH=R0;                    /* SAVE INPUT LENGTH             */ 01259000
         ST    R0,AFSLNGTH                                         0292 01260000
*   AFSREG3=R3;                     /* SAVE CALLER'S REG 3           */ 01261000
         ST    R3,AFSREG3                                          0293 01262000
*   AFSREG4=R4;                     /* SAVE CALLER'S REG 4           */ 01263000
         ST    R4,AFSREG4                                          0294 01264000
*   AFSREG7=R7;                     /* SAVE CALLER'S REG 7           */ 01265000
         ST    R7,AFSREG7                                          0295 01266000
*   RFY                                                            0296 01267000
*    (R0,                                                          0296 01268000
*     R1,                                                          0296 01269000
*     R3,                                                          0296 01270000
*     R4,                                                          0296 01271000
*     R7,                                                          0296 01272000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0296 01273000
*   IF AFSLNGTH=LENGTH(ASPCT)       /* CHECK WHICH SUBPOOL TO USE    */ 01274000
*     THEN                          /* ACTIVE ASPCT                  */ 01275000
         L     @12,AFSLNGTH                                        0297 01276000
         C     @12,@CF01447                                        0297 01277000
         BNE   @RF00297                                            0297 01278000
*     AFSSPID=AFSSP255;             /* SET SUBPOOL FOR LSQA          */ 01279000
         MVC   AFSSPID(4),@CF01361                                 0298 01280000
*   ELSE                            /* I/O BUFFERS                   */ 01281000
*     AFSSPID=AFSSP230;             /* SET SUBPOOL FOR USER KEY      */ 01282000
         B     @RC00297                                            0299 01283000
@RF00297 MVC   AFSSPID(4),@CF01427                                 0299 01284000
         EJECT                                                          01285000
*                                                                  0300 01286000
*/********************************************************************/ 01287000
*/*                                                                  */ 01288000
*/*  A TEST IS NOW MADE FOR EXTENSIONS. IF THERE ARE EXTENSIONS,     */ 01289000
*/*  THEY ARE FREED FIRST. FIRST ALL LPME EXTENSIONS FOR A PARTICULAR*/ 01290000
*/*  ASST EXTENSION ARE FREED, THEN THAT ASST EXTENSION IS FREED.    */ 01291000
*/*  THIS PROCESS IS REPEATED UNTIL ALL EXTENSIONS ARE FREED.        */ 01292000
*/*                                                                  */ 01293000
*/********************************************************************/ 01294000
*                                                                  0300 01295000
*   IF AFSASPCT->ASPAEXCTÂ¬=AFSZERO  /* ARE THERE ANY EXTENSIONS?     */ 01296000
*     THEN                                                         0300 01297000

         LH    @11,ASPAEXCT(,@12)                                  0300 01299000
         LTR   @11,@11                                             0300 01300000
         BZ    @RF00300                                            0300 01301000
*     DO;                           /* YES                           */ 01302000
*       AFSB=AFSONE;                /* SET BASE SUBSCRIPT FOR FIRST     01303000
*                                      ASST EXTENSION                */ 01304000
         LA    @11,1                                               0302 01305000
         STH   @11,AFSB                                            0302 01306000
*       AFSA=AFSTWO;                /* SET ASST SUBSCRIPT FOR FIRST     01307000
*                                      LPME EXTENSION OFF FIRST ASST    01308000
*                                      EXTENSION. GET PTR TO FIRST 0303 01309000
*                                      ASST EXT                      */ 01310000
         MVC   AFSA(4),@CF00108                                    0303 01311000
*       AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);                         0304 01312000
         L     @08,AFSASPCT                                        0304 01313000
         SLA   @11,2                                               0304 01314000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@11,@08)                        0304 01315000
*       DO WHILE AFSEXPTRÂ¬=AFSZERO; /* LOOP UNTIL WE HAVE PROCESSED     01316000
*                                      ALL ASST EXTENSIONS GET PTR TO   01317000
*                                      LPME EXT                      */ 01318000
         B     @DE00305                                            0305 01319000
@DL00305 DS    0H                                                  0306 01320000
*         AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);                        0306 01321000
         L     @08,AFSA                                            0306 01322000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0306 01323000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@08,AFSEXPTR)                    0306 01324000
*         DO WHILE AFSWORKÂ¬=AFSZERO;/* LOOP UNTIL WE HAVE PROCESSED     01325000
*                                      ALL LPME EXTENSIONS FOR A   0307 01326000
*                                      PARTICULAR ASST EXTENSION     */ 01327000
         B     @DE00307                                            0307 01328000
@DL00307 DS    0H                                                  0308 01329000
*           CALL AFSFREE;           /* FREE AN LPME EXTENSION        */ 01330000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0308 01331000
*           RFY                                                    0309 01332000
*             R15 RSTD;                                            0309 01333000
*           IF R15=AFSZERO          /* SUCCESSFUL FREEMAIN?          */ 01334000
*             THEN                                                 0310 01335000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0310 01336000
         BNZ   @RF00310                                            0310 01337000
*             DO;                   /* YES                           */ 01338000
*               RFY                                                0312 01339000
*                 R15 UNRSTD;                                      0312 01340000
*               AFSA=AFSA+AFSONE;   /* INCREMENT ASST SUBSCRIPT      */ 01341000
         LA    @11,1                                               0313 01342000
         AL    @11,AFSA                                            0313 01343000
         ST    @11,AFSA                                            0313 01344000
*               IF AFSA<AFS257      /* REACHED END OF ARRAY          */ 01345000
*                 THEN              /* NO, GET PTR TO NEXT LPME EX   */ 01346000
         C     @11,@CF01408                                        0314 01347000
         BNL   @RF00314                                            0314 01348000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);                0315 01349000
         L     @08,AFSA                                            0315 01350000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0315 01351000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@08,AFSEXPTR)                    0315 01352000
*               ELSE                /* YES, FORCE EXIT FROM LOOP     */ 01353000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSZERO;                                 0316 01354000
         B     @RC00314                                            0316 01355000
@RF00314 SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0316 01356000
*             END;                  /* THIS IS THE LOGICAL END OF THE   01357000
*                                      DO WHILE LOOP FOR LPME      0317 01358000
*                                      EXTENSIONS. PHYSICAL END IS 0317 01359000
*                                      AFTER THE ERROR CODE PROCESS     01360000
*                                      ING FOR A NON-ZERO RETURN FROM   01361000
*                                      AFSFREE.                      */ 01362000
         EJECT                                                          01363000
*                                                                  0318 01364000
*/********************************************************************/ 01365000
*/* THIS SECTION WILL PROCESS A NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM AFSFREE    */ 01366000
*/* FOR LPME EXTENSIONS. PROCESSING CONSISTS OF GETTING THE POINTER  */ 01367000
*/* TO THE NEXT LPME EXTENSION, AND VERIFYING THAT IT IS AN LPME     */ 01368000
*/* EXTENSION. IF IT IS WE WILL CONTINUE FREEING LPME EXTENSIONS,    */ 01369000
*/* IF NOT, WE WILL FORCE AN EXIT FROM THE LOOP.                     */ 01370000
*/********************************************************************/ 01371000
*                                                                  0318 01372000
*           ELSE                                                   0318 01373000
*             DO;                   /* NON-ZERO RETURN FROM AFSFREE  */ 01374000
         B     @RC00310                                            0318 01375000
@RF00310 DS    0H                                                  0319 01376000
*               AFSA=AFSA+AFSONE;   /* INCREMENT ASST SUBSCRIPT      */ 01377000
         LA    @11,1                                               0319 01378000
         AL    @11,AFSA                                            0319 01379000
         ST    @11,AFSA                                            0319 01380000
*               IF AFSA<AFS257      /* REACHED END OF ASST ARRAY?    */ 01381000
*                 THEN                                             0320 01382000
         C     @11,@CF01408                                        0320 01383000
         BNL   @RF00320                                            0320 01384000
*                 DO;               /* NO GET PTR TO NEXT LPME EXT   */ 01385000
*                   AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR->ASPASSTE(AFSA);/* IS THIS A  0322 01386000
*                                      VALID LPME EXT?               */ 01387000
         L     @08,AFSA                                            0322 01388000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0322 01389000
         L     AFSWORK,ASPASSTE-4(@08,AFSEXPTR)                    0322 01390000
*                   IF AFSWORK->ASPEIDNTÂ¬='LPME' THEN/* NO           */ 01391000
         CLC   ASPEIDNT(4,AFSWORK),@CC01438                        0323 01392000
         BE    @RF00323                                            0323 01393000
*                     AFSWORK=AFSZERO;/* FORCE LOOP EXIT             */ 01394000
         SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0324 01395000
*                 END;                                             0325 01396000
*               ELSE                /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01397000
*                 AFSWORK=AFSZERO;  /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01398000
         B     @RC00320                                            0326 01399000
@RF00320 SLR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0326 01400000
*             END;                                                 0327 01401000
@RC00320 DS    0H                                                  0328 01402000
*         END;                      /* THIS IS THE PHYSICAL END OF 0328 01403000
*                                      THE DO WHILE LOOP FOR LPME  0328 01404000
*                                      EXTENSIONS.                   */ 01405000
@RC00310 DS    0H                                                  0328 01406000
@DE00307 LTR   AFSWORK,AFSWORK                                     0328 01407000
         BNZ   @DL00307                                            0328 01408000
         EJECT                                                          01409000
*                                                                  0329 01410000
*/********************************************************************/ 01411000
*/* THIS SECTION PROCESSES THE ASST EXTENSIONS                       */ 01412000
*/********************************************************************/ 01413000
*                                                                  0329 01414000
*         AFSWORK=AFSEXPTR;         /* SET FREEMAIN POINTER TO AN  0329 01415000
*                                      ASST EXTENSION                */ 01416000
         LR    AFSWORK,AFSEXPTR                                    0329 01417000
*         CALL AFSFREE;             /* FREE THE ASST EXTENSION       */ 01418000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0330 01419000
*         RFY                                                      0331 01420000
*           R15 RSTD;                                              0331 01421000
*         IF R15=AFSZERO            /* FREEMAIN SUCCESSFUL?          */ 01422000
*           THEN                                                   0332 01423000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0332 01424000
         BNZ   @RF00332                                            0332 01425000
*           DO;                     /* YES                           */ 01426000
*             RFY                                                  0334 01427000
*               R15 UNRSTD;                                        0334 01428000
*             AFSB=AFSB+AFSONE;     /* INCREMENT BASE SUBSCRIPT      */ 01429000
         LA    @12,1                                               0335 01430000
         LH    @11,AFSB                                            0335 01431000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0335 01432000
         STH   @11,AFSB                                            0335 01433000
*             IF AFSB<AFSFIVE       /* REACHED END OF ARRAY?         */ 01434000
*               THEN                                               0336 01435000
         C     @11,@CF01025                                        0336 01436000
         BNL   @RF00336                                            0336 01437000
*               DO;                 /* NO GET PTR TO NEXT ASST EXT   */ 01438000
*                 AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);               0338 01439000
         SLA   @11,2                                               0338 01440000
         L     @08,AFSASPCT                                        0338 01441000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@11,@08)                        0338 01442000
*                 AFSA=AFSONE;      /* RESET ASST SUBSCRIPT          */ 01443000
         LA    @11,1                                               0339 01444000
         ST    @11,AFSA                                            0339 01445000
*               END;                                               0340 01446000
*             ELSE                  /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01447000
*               AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;   /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01448000
         B     @RC00336                                            0341 01449000
@RF00336 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0341 01450000
*           END;                    /* THIS THE LOGICAL END OF THE DO   01451000
*                                      WHILE LOOP FOR ASST         0342 01452000
*                                      EXTENSIONS. PHYSICAL END IS 0342 01453000
*                                      AFTER THE ERROR CODE PROCESS     01454000
*                                      ING FOR A NON-ZERO RETURN FROM   01455000
*                                      AFSFREE                       */ 01456000
         EJECT                                                          01457000
*                                                                  0343 01458000
*/********************************************************************/ 01459000
*/* THIS SECTION WILL PROCESS A NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM AFSFREE    */ 01460000
*/* FOR ASST EXTENSIONS. PROCESSING CONSISTS OF GETTING THE POINTER  */ 01461000
*/* TO THE NEXT ASST EXTENSION, AND VERIFYING THAT IT IS AN ASST     */ 01462000
*/* EXTENSION. IF IT IS WE WILL CONTINUE FREEING ASST EXTENSIONS,    */ 01463000
*/* IF NOT, WE WILL FORCE AN EXIT FROM THE LOOP.                     */ 01464000
*/********************************************************************/ 01465000
*                                                                  0343 01466000
*         ELSE                                                     0343 01467000
*           DO;                     /* NON-ZERO RETURN CODE FROM   0343 01468000
*                                      AFSFREE                       */ 01469000
         B     @RC00332                                            0343 01470000
@RF00332 DS    0H                                                  0344 01471000
*             AFSB=AFSB+AFSONE;     /* INCREMENT BASE SUBSCRIPT      */ 01472000
         LA    @12,1                                               0344 01473000
         LH    @11,AFSB                                            0344 01474000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0344 01475000
         STH   @11,AFSB                                            0344 01476000
*             IF AFSB<AFSFIVE       /* REACHED END OF ARRAY          */ 01477000
*               THEN                                               0345 01478000
         C     @11,@CF01025                                        0345 01479000
         BNL   @RF00345                                            0345 01480000
*               DO;                 /* GET PTR TO NEXT ASST          */ 01481000
*                 AFSEXPTR=AFSASPCT->ASPASSTP(AFSB);/* VALID ASST  0347 01482000
*                                      EXTENSION?                    */ 01483000
         SLA   @11,2                                               0347 01484000
         L     @08,AFSASPCT                                        0347 01485000
         L     AFSEXPTR,ASPASSTP-4(@11,@08)                        0347 01486000
*                 IF AFSEXPTR->ASPEIDNT='ASST' THEN/* YES            */ 01487000
         CLC   ASPEIDNT(4,AFSEXPTR),@CC01439                       0348 01488000
         BNE   @RF00348                                            0348 01489000
*                   AFSA=AFSONE;    /* RESET ASST SUBSCRIPT          */ 01490000
         LA    @11,1                                               0349 01491000
         ST    @11,AFSA                                            0349 01492000
*                 ELSE              /* NO                            */ 01493000
*                   AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;/* FORCE LOOP EXIT              */ 01494000
         B     @RC00348                                            0350 01495000
@RF00348 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0350 01496000
*               END;                                               0351 01497000
*             ELSE                  /* YES, REACHED END OF ARRAY     */ 01498000
*               AFSEXPTR=AFSZERO;   /* FORCE LOOP EXIT               */ 01499000
         B     @RC00345                                            0352 01500000
@RF00345 SLR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0352 01501000
*           END;                                                   0353 01502000
@RC00345 DS    0H                                                  0354 01503000
*       END;                        /* PHYSICAL END OF DO WHILE LOOP    01504000
*                                      FOR ASST EXTENSIONS           */ 01505000
@RC00332 DS    0H                                                  0354 01506000
@DE00305 LTR   AFSEXPTR,AFSEXPTR                                   0354 01507000
         BNZ   @DL00305                                            0354 01508000
*     END;                                                         0355 01509000
         EJECT                                                          01510000
*                                                                  0356 01511000
*/********************************************************************/ 01512000
*/* THIS SECTION FREES THE ASPCT BASE                                */ 01513000
*/********************************************************************/ 01514000
*                                                                  0356 01515000
*   AFSWORK=AFSASPCT;               /* GET PTR TO THE ASPCT BASE     */ 01516000
@RF00300 L     AFSWORK,AFSASPCT                                    0356 01517000
*   CALL AFSFREE;                   /* FREE THE BASE                 */ 01518000
         BAL   @14,AFSFREE                                         0357 01519000
         EJECT                                                          01520000
*   RFY                                                            0358 01521000
*    (R3,                                                          0358 01522000
*     R4,                                                          0358 01523000
*     R7,                                                          0358 01524000
*     R14) RSTD;                                                   0358 01525000
*   R3=AFSREG3;                     /* RESTORE CALLER'S REG 3        */ 01526000
         L     R3,AFSREG3                                          0359 01527000
*   R4=AFSREG4;                     /* RESTORE CALLER'S REG 4        */ 01528000
         L     R4,AFSREG4                                          0360 01529000
*   R7=AFSREG7;                     /* RESTORE CALLER'S REG 7        */ 01530000
         L     R7,AFSREG7                                          0361 01531000
*   R14=AFSRET1;                    /* GET RETURN ADDRESS            */ 01532000
         L     R14,AFSRET1                                         0362 01533000
*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01534000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0363 01535000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0363 01536000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 0363 01537000
*   RFY                                                            0364 01538000
*    (R3,                                                          0364 01539000
*     R4,                                                          0364 01540000
*     R7,                                                          0364 01541000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0364 01542000
         EJECT                                                          01543000
*                                                                  0365 01544000
*/********************************************************************/ 01545000
*/*                                                                  */ 01546000
*/*  AFSFREE:  FREE ASPCT EXTN OF STORAGE                            */ 01547000
*/*                                                                  */ 01548000
*/*  INPUT:  ADDRESS OF EXTN IN REGISTER 1                           */ 01549000
*/*                                                                  */ 01550000
*/*  PROCESS:  SET UP REGS, ISSUE FREEMAIN MACRO TO FREE ASPCT EXTN. */ 01551000
*/*                                                                  */ 01552000
*/*  OUTPUT:  RETURN CODE IN REGISTER 15                             */ 01553000
*/*             00 - NORMAL RETURN                                   */ 01554000
*/*             44 - FREEMAIN RETURNED ERROR CODE                    */ 01555000
*/*                                                                  */ 01556000
*/********************************************************************/ 01557000
*/*AFSFREE: CHART (AREF)                                             */ 01558000
*/*HEADER                                                          0365 01559000
*/*  ILRAFS00                                                      0365 01560000
*/* AFSFREE - FREEMAIN THE ASPCT                                     */ 01561000
*/*AFSFREE: E  ENTRY                                                 */ 01562000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 01563000
*/*         N  THIS NEXT TEST AND RESULTING LEGS OF CODE, IS A MACRO */ 01564000
*/*         N  PASS TEST AND EXPANSION.                              */ 01565000
*/*         D  (YES,,NO,%AFS07) SVC OK?                              */ 01566000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 14 WITH SUBPOOL ID                           */ 01567000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 0 WITH LENGTH                                */ 01568000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH ADDRESS OF AREA TO BE FREED           */ 01569000
*/*         S  (,%AFS08) FREEMAIN: FREE THE ASPCT                    */ 01570000
*/*%AFS07:  P  LOAD REG 0 WITH LENTH                                 */ 01571000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH ADDRESS OF AREA TO BE FREED           */ 01572000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 4 WITH CURRENT TCB ADDRESS                   */ 01573000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 7 WITH CURRENT ASCB ADDRESS                  */ 01574000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 3 WITH SUBPOOL ID                            */ 01575000
*/*         S  IEAVGM00: FREE THE ASPCT                              */ 01576000
*/*%AFS08:  D  (YES,%AFS09,NO,) ZERO RETURN CODE?                    */ 01577000
*/*         P  SAVE FREEMAINS RETURN CODE                            */ 01578000
*/*         P  SET RETURN CODE TO 68                                 */ 01579000
*/*%AFS09:  R  RETURN TO MAINLINE                                    */ 01580000
*                                                                  0365 01581000
         EJECT                                                          01582000
*AFSFREE:                           /* FREEMAIN AN EXTN OF ASPCT     */ 01583000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0365 01584000
AFSFREE  DS    0H                                                  0366 01585000
*   RFY                                                            0366 01586000
*     R14 RSTD;                                                    0366 01587000
*   AFSRET2=R14;                    /* SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS       */ 01588000
         ST    R14,AFSRET2                                         0367 01589000
*   RFY                                                            0368 01590000
*    (R0,                                                          0368 01591000
*     R1,                                                          0368 01592000
*     R3,                                                          0368 01593000
*     R4,                                                          0368 01594000
*     R7) RSTD;                                                    0368 01595000
*   R0=AFSLNGTH;                    /* GET THE LENGTH OF AREA TO BE     01596000
*                                      FREED                         */ 01597000
         L     R0,AFSLNGTH                                         0369 01598000
*   R1=AFSWORK;                     /* GET ADDRESS OF AREA TO FREE   */ 01599000
         LR    R1,AFSWORK                                          0370 01600000
*   R4=PSATOLD;                     /* GET CURRENT TCB ADDRESS       */ 01601000
         L     R4,PSATOLD                                          0371 01602000
*   R7=PSAAOLD;                     /* GET CURRENT ASCB ADDRESS      */ 01603000
         L     R7,PSAAOLD                                          0372 01604000
*   R3=AFSSPID;                     /* GET SUBPOOL ID                */ 01605000
         L     R3,AFSSPID                                          0373 01606000
*   GENERATE REFS(R0,R1,R3,R4,R7,CVTCRMN,CVTMAP);                  0374 01607000
        FREEMAIN RC,A=(1),LV=(0),SP=(3),BRANCH=YES                      01608000
*   RFY                                                            0375 01609000
*    (R0,                                                          0375 01610000
*     R1,                                                          0375 01611000
*     R3,                                                          0375 01612000
*     R4,                                                          0375 01613000
*     R7,                                                          0375 01614000
*     R14) UNRSTD;                                                 0375 01615000
*   RFY                                                            0376 01616000
*    (R14,                                                         0376 01617000
*     R15) RSTD;                                                   0376 01618000
*   IF R15Â¬=AFSZERO                 /* FREEMAIN SUCCESSFUL?          */ 01619000
*     THEN                          /* NO                            */ 01620000
         LTR   R15,R15                                             0377 01621000
         BZ    @RF00377                                            0377 01622000
*     R15=AFS44;                    /* SET RETURN CODE TO 44         */ 01623000
         LA    R15,44                                              0378 01624000
*   R14=AFSRET2;                    /* GET RETURN ADDRESS            */ 01625000
@RF00377 L     R14,AFSRET2                                         0379 01626000
*   RFY                                                            0380 01627000
*    (R14,                                                         0380 01628000
*     R15) UNRSTD;                                                 0380 01629000
*   END AFSFREE;                                                   0381 01630000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0381 01631000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0381 01632000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0381 01633000
*   END ILRAFS00;                                                  0382 01634000
         EJECT                                                          01635000
*                                                                  0383 01636000
*/********************************************************************/ 01637000
*/*                                                                  */ 01638000
*/*  TMRLPME: RELEASE A SLOT BACK TO THE SYSTEM                      */ 01639000
*/*                                                                  */ 01640000
*/*  INPUT:   REGISTER 0 = CORRESPONDING RPN                         */ 01641000
*/*           REGISTER 1 = PTR TO LPME                               */ 01642000
*/*                                                                  */ 01643000
*/*  PROCESS: SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS. FLAG THE LPME AS INVALID. CALL*/ 01644000
*/*           ILRFRSLT TO FREE THE SLOT. INCREMENT THE FREED SLOT    */ 01645000
*/*           COUNTER. RETURN TO ILRALS00.                           */ 01646000
*/*                                                                  */ 01647000
*/*  OUTPUT:  SLOT RELEASED TO THE SYSTEM                            */ 01648000
*/*                                                                  */ 01649000
*/********************************************************************/ 01650000
*/*TMRLPME: CHART (AREF)                                             */ 01651000
*/*HEADER                                                          0383 01652000
*/*  ILRTMRLG                                                      0383 01653000
*/* TMRLPME: RELEASE THE SLOT ASSIGNED TO AN LPME                    */ 01654000
*/*TMRLPME: E  ENTRY                                                 */ 01655000
*/*         P  SAVE THE RETURN ADDRESS                               */ 01656000
*/*         P  INITIALIZE LPMEPTR                                    */ 01657000
*/*         P  FLAG THE LPME AS INVALID                              */ 01658000
*/*         D  (ON,%TMR10,OFF,) I/O ERROR FLAG (ASPLIOER)            */ 01659000
*/*         P  LOAD REG 1 WITH THE LSID TO BE FREED                  */ 01660000
*/*         S  ILRFRSL1: FREE THE SLOT                               */ 01661000
*/*%TMR10:  P  INCREMENT THE FREESLOT COUNTER                        */ 01662000
*/*         R  RETURN TO ILRALS00                                    */ 01663000
*/*TMRLPME: END                                                      */ 01664000
*                                                                  0383 01665000
         EJECT                                                          01666000
*TMRLPME:                                                          0383 01667000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0383 01668000
TMRLPME  DS    0H                                                  0384 01669000
*   RFY                                                            0384 01670000
*    (R0,                                                          0384 01671000
*     R1,                                                          0384 01672000
*     R14,                                                         0384 01673000
*     ACEPTR,                                                      0384 01674000
*     ASPCTPTR,                                                    0384 01675000
*     LPMEPTR) RSTD;                                               0384 01676000
*                                                                  0384 01677000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01678000
*   /*                                                               */ 01679000
*   /* OBTAIN A POINTER TO THE LPME TO BE FREED. FLAG THE LPME AS    */ 01680000
*   /* INVALID. ONLY CALL FREESLOT ROUTINE TO RELEASE THOSE SLOTS    */ 01681000
*   /* THAT HAVE NOT ENCOUNTERED A PERMANENT READ I/O ERROR (I.E.,   */ 01682000
*   /* THE I/O ERROR FLAG IN THE LPME IS OFF). ALWAYS INCREMENT THE  */ 01683000
*   /* FREESLOT COUNTER REGARDLESS IF THE SLOT HAS BEEN RELEASED TO  */ 01684000
*   /* THE SYSTEM OR IF THE SLOT HAS BEEN LOST BECAUSE OF A PERMANENT*/ 01685000
*   /* READ I/O ERROR.                                               */ 01686000
*   /*                                                               */ 01687000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01688000
*                                                                  0385 01689000
*   SAVRET@=R14;                    /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 01690000
         ST    R14,SAVRET@                                         0385 01691000
*   LPMEPTR=R1;                     /* INITIALIZE LPME POINTER       */ 01692000
*   ASPLVALD=OFF;                   /* SET LPME VALID FLAG OFF     0387 01693000
*                                      INDICATING THAT THIS LPME IS     01694000
*                                      INVALID                       */ 01695000
         NI    ASPLVALD(LPMEPTR),B'01111111'                       0387 01696000
*   IF ASPLIOER=OFF THEN                                           0388 01697000
         TM    ASPLIOER(LPMEPTR),B'00010000'                       0388 01698000
         BNZ   @RF00388                                            0388 01699000
*     DO;                                                          0389 01700000
*       R1=ASPVLSID;                /* PUT INTO REG1 THE LSID TO BE     01701000
*                                      FREED                         */ 01702000
         L     @15,ASPVLSID-1(,LPMEPTR)                            0390 01703000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0390 01704000
         LR    R1,@15                                              0390 01705000
*       CALL ILRFRSL1;              /* FREE THE SLOT INDICATED BY THE   01706000
*                                      LSID                          */ 01707000
         L     @15,ASMPFRSL(,ASMVTPTR)                             0391 01708000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0391 01709000
*     END;                                                         0392 01710000
*   FREESLOT=FREESLOT+ONE;          /* INCREMENT FREESLOT COUNTER    */ 01711000
@RF00388 LA    @15,1                                               0393 01712000
         AL    @15,FREESLOT                                        0393 01713000
         ST    @15,FREESLOT                                        0393 01714000
*   R14=SAVRET@;                    /* RESTORE REG 14 WITH SAVED   0394 01715000
*                                      RETURN ADDRESS                */ 01716000
         L     R14,SAVRET@                                         0394 01717000
*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01718000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0395 01719000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0395 01720000
@ER00005 BR    @14                                                 0395 01721000
*   RFY                                                            0396 01722000
*    (R0,                                                          0396 01723000
*     R1,                                                          0396 01724000
*     R14,                                                         0396 01725000
*     ACEPTR,                                                      0396 01726000
*     ASPCTPTR,                                                    0396 01727000
*     LPMEPTR) UNRSTD;                                             0396 01728000
*   END TMRLPME;                                                   0397 01729000
@PB00005 DS    0H                                                  0397 01730000
*   END ILRTMRLG                                                   0398 01731000
*                                                                  0398 01732000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 01733000

         DC    AL3(@ENDDATD-@DATD)                                      01863000
@CV01351 DC    V(ILRACT)                                                01864000
@CV01353 DC    V(ILRRLG)                                                01865000
@CV01354 DC    V(ILRSAV)                                                01866000
@CV01356 DC    V(ILRTMI01)                                              01867000
@CV01357 DC    V(ILRVSAMI)                                              01868000
         DS    0D                                                       01869000
ILRCBTM1 DC    AL4(STRTPGM@)                                            01870000
ALSLPMEL DC    AL4(4)                                                   01871000
@CC01364 DC    C'ILRTMI00'                                              01872000
@CC01438 DC    C'LPME'                                                  01873000
@CC01439 DC    C'ASST'                                                  01874000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          01875000
WKARLEN EQU @SIZDATD                                                    01876000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          01877000
ESTAELST ESTAE MF=L                                                     01878000
ILRTMRLG CSECT                                                          01879000
ESTAEFMT ESTAE TERM=YES,MF=L                                            01880000
ESTAELEN DC    A(*-ESTAEFMT)                                            01881000
ILRTMRLG CSECT                                                          01882000
TMRPATCH DC    ((@DATA-@MAINENT)/19)X'00'                               01883000
         ORG   TMRPATCH                                                 01884000
         DC    C'MAINTENANCE AREA'                                      01885000
         DC    34X'00'                                                  01886000
         ORG                                                            01887000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          01888000
         ORG   *+1-(*-@DATD)/(*-@DATD) INSURE DSECT DATA                01889000

./  ADD  SSI=60910172,NAME=ILRVIOCM
         TITLE 'ILRVIOCM - VIO COMPLETION ROUTINE                      *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
ILRVIOCM  CSECT                                                         00003000
          USING *,15                                                    00004000
          MODID                                                         00005000
          DROP  15                                                      00006000
          STM   0,14,ASMWKSA6(ASMVTPTR)                                 00007000
          BALR  10,0                                                    00008000
          USING *,10                                                    00009000
*   ATAVIOCM=ON;                    /* SET ENTRY INFO IN ATA         */ 00010000
         OI    ATAVIOCM(ATAPTR),B'00010000'                        0058 00011000
*   AIAPTR=ATAAIA;                  /* GET AIA POINTER FROM ATA      */ 00012000
         L     AIAPTR,ATAAIA(,ATAPTR)                              0059 00013000
*   RFY                                                            0060 00014000
*    (R11,                                                         0060 00015000
*     R12,                                                         0060 00016000
*     R13,                                                         0060 00017000
*     R14) RSTD;                    /* RESTRICT USE OF REGS 11-14    */ 00018000
*   R11=ADDR(ASHLOCK);              /* GET ADDRESS OF ASM LOCKWORD   */ 00019000

*   GEN REFS(PSALITA,R11) SETS(R12,R13,R14);                       0062 00021000

               RELATED=RELE                                             00023000
*   RFY                                                            0063 00024000
*    (R11,                                                         0063 00025000
*     R12,                                                         0063 00026000
*     R13,                                                         0063 00027000
